name: Arena Football '95
description: Arena Football '95 is an unreleased arena football video game that was in development by V-Real Interactive and planned to be published by Atari Corporation on a scheduled August 1995 release exclusively for the Atari Jaguar. If it had been released before Midway Games' Kurt Warner's Arena Football Unleashed, it would have been the first officially licensed indoor american football game by the Arena Football League. Adopting the more faster and frantic style of play from the sport compared to american football, players would have the choice of playing across any of the game modes available against with either CPU-controlled opponents or other players, while including all the rules and teams from the 1995 Arena Football League season including the Miami Hooters, who make their only game appearance in the title and were not included in Electronic Arts' Arena Football. Originally conceived in 1993, the game was announced in early 1994 and showcased at SCES '94 but the project would be later cancelled in 1995 after various delays and expenses, despite being close to completion. Although unreleased, a playable prototype has since been released and sold online by independent groups such as the defunct Jaguar Sector II website and later B&C Computervisions.

name: Brett Hull NHL Hockey
description: Brett Hull NHL Hockey is an unfinished game for the Atari Jaguar. A beta build of the cartridge version of Brett Hull NHL Hockey was released by B&C Computervisions on January 9, 2004 for US$50. Brett Hull NHL Hockey is a ice hockey game that is played from a vertical perspective in a two-dimensional environment with sprites. Most of the rules from the sport are present in the title, though they can be disabled from the menu and in-game options. Some of the gameplay options found within the game include an exhibition match, regular season and playoff competitions, among other modes of play. The announcer, Al Michaels, makes commentary during gameplay and announces Brett Hull by name but other players are only called by their respective jersey number due to the lack of the NHL license, while his commentaries can also be turned off on the options menu. Season progress is only kept via password and there is also a two-player option for every mode.

name: Rocky & Bullwinkle
description:
An unreleased Intellivision game from 1983.

Math mode to this game. "Rocky and Bullwinkle must stop the evil Boris and Natasha from robbing a train full of priceless valuables. While Boris uses "Upsidasium" to float the valuables up to Natasha's waiting helicopter, Rocky must fly around and intercept them. When Rocky catches the valuables, he gives them to Bullwinkle for safe keeping."

name: Spirit of the Island: Paradise Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Takeover
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1982

Takeover is a strategy game where the objective is to capture your opponent's capital city. This is accomplished by a coordinated effort of the armies, fleets, cities and roads at the player's disposal. The game is played with five different scenarios and randomly situated capital cities which form constraints to each player's basic strategy.

name: Trick or Treat
description:
Also known as Street or Halloween Street, Trick or Treat was an unreleased game for the Intellivision from 1983

Go trick-or-treating; get candy from houses where the lights are on. Avoid the witches, ghosts and pumpkins.

name: The Legend of Legacy HD Remastered: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Number Jumble
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1983

Cut across fire in a Time Sailer, cruise under water in a Submarine, fly through thin air in a Zeppelin, or roll across the Earth in a Tank -- but never stop firing at the dreadful creatures that beset you! Shoot them down with the fireballs you control and they'll turn into black numbers. When you shoot enough creatures, you get a chance to solve exciting mathematical equations...and score big points! Hurry, for every second counts! Have fun! 1 or 2 players. 1 little man under your control when the game starts, 4 more in reserve. 4 different environments to choose from! Simple to more complex equations. Both "scratch pad" and "solution" areas to work on. Choose from 48 skill levels. Transport Houses found in every environment to give you bonus multipliers. Progressive scoring setup, according to your skill level and speed in solving equations. Automatic transfer to a higher level once you've mastered the one you're on!

name: Hard Hat
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1984.

Place your workman on the floor where the center moving scaffold is. Run to the scaffold and your workman will jump from the building to the scaffold. Pick up a pane of glass and move it into place. Complete your building before your opponent does. If your opponent is getting ahead of you, do not fret; run over to his building and knock off his panes! Programmers at Mattel Electronics came up with a series of casual games meant to be played at parties. The "Party Line" cartridge was shown at the 1984 CES but never produced.

name: Go for the Gold
description: An unreleased album cartridge of four previously released games with a 1984 Sarajevo Olympic license. Games would have included Skiing, Hockey, Boxing and Basketball. In 1998 its prototype menu screen was included on the Intellivision Lives! CD.

name: Illusions
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1983

The enchanted mirror splits you into multiple images. You must become whole before time runs out. Changing stairways and folding cubes with SuperGraphics try to keep you from safety.

name: StudioQuiz
description: Unlock Knowledge Battles! Navigate StudioQuiz, your arena for explosive culture clashes, daring trivia duels, and victorious conquests with friends in a world where every question is an adventure!

name: Kekcroc
description: Sin descripción

name: Scrabble
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man X
description: Unofficial homebrew port of Mega Man X for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive.

name: Stonegate
description: Sin descripción

name: Motocross: The Force
description: Sin descripción

name: HappyFunland: Souvenir Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Candy Mountain Massacre 2
description: Violence is best when it's sugar-coated. A fun first-person 3D shooter with weird and funny twists.

name: ShotGun Exorcist
description: ShotGun Exorcist is a bloody fast-paced retro FPS inspired by the mid-90s classics that defined the genre. Battle through swarms of demon spawn as you hunt down the son of Satan. Use a variety of both outlandish and realistic weapons to demolish everything that stands in your way.

name: Project: Genesis
description: You wake up in a research facility and hear from the managing AI that humanity is in crisis due to an unknown virus. The AI requests that you conduct various experiments. Recognizing the dangers outside the facility, you decide to proceed with the experiments.

name: Days Of My Life
description: What is human destiny? Do our actions decide much in our fate? What if I told you that life can be lived in different ways? What if you had asked that girl out on a date and your life would have been different? Well, nothing can be returned…

name: Occultist Girl Magatsuhi
description: Sprite scaling shooting game, in which you play as a flying onmyouji.

name: Buff Huckem Fully Wrecked
description: A humorous action platformer. Fight through standard enemies and bosses using melee and short ranged combat as you platform through a world based in 90's cartoon style. Upgrade your abilities as you progress to become an unstoppable force of...gas.

name: Glukhovo
description: Sometimes, regrets come too late. When you're over 40, you start to rethink your life. You remember people and events that completely changed you. I will tell you 7 stories that happened to me in childhood, after which I became a different person.

name: Enigma Station
description: Explore layers of deep future in Enigma Station, a Narrative-driven Adventure game. Delve into a mind-bending world, solve spatial puzzles using "Space Magic" and find your true self in a philosophical story inspired by themes of Transhumanism, Cosmic Consciousness, and Love.

name: Falling Day
description: Falling Day is an emotional, story-driven adventure game about coming of age and resolving supernatural mysteries. Two students become involved in several mysteries, murders, suicides, and paranormal incidents. The two must cooperate in order to discover the truth.

name: Warrior Chef
description: Play as Mako, a Warrior Chef in a fantasy world of sentient food, chopping up foes for ingredients to cook new abilities in a 3D Hack and Slash about eating your way through four Food Kingdoms in a race to stop the spreading Rot.

name: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! - Pirates of the Disturbance: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Transilio
description: Retro-style frenzy awaits as you dash through demon-filled dungeons in this fast-paced top-down dungeon crawler.

name: The Adventures of Sir Kicksalot
description: A first-person action game that provides various ways for defeating your foes, whether through weaponry, magic, stealth, or clever tactics like kicking into deadly spikes.

name: Lizard Slayer
description: Lizard Slayer - an arena shooter with roguelike elements. You will take on the role of an ancient Slavs and participate in real historical battles against lizards.

name: Fence
description: Fence is a Crime/Trading RPG set in The Bronx during the early 1990’s. You play as Jimmy, a recently expelled high schooler that’s trying to make ends meet while his alcoholic mother drinks her life away.

name: The Whistle
description: Dave Wilson, a 20 year old adult who loves to go camping. Little did he know what would happen once he explored the forest of Harmony Hus Lake.

name: Wrestling Empire Forever
description: Sin descripción

name: Multiversal Affairs
description: Multiversal Affairs is an episodic physics-based pixel-art metroidvania/platformer/thing delightfully full of diverse creatures that try to live together in a society controlled by an autocratic government.

name: Gateworlds
description: A nomadic colony sim with portals. Manage your settlers, explore strange new worlds through a mystical gate, and overcome the dangers you find there to succeed on the wild frontier of the Gateworlds.

name: Sparkhunt
description: Sparkhunt - is a classic 2.5D beat 'em up inspired by the games from the 90s with a complex combat system and the modern visuals. Let the grim ghost town be your arena.

name: Peace Breaker
description: Simplistic mecha battling PC game.

name: Aethus
description: Aethus is a story-driven survival game with a low-poly isometric style and deep, systemic gameplay. Explore a futuristic underground world to mine and prospect for the valuable resources you need to build up your mining outpost, while unraveling a dystopian corporate conspiracy.

name: Dice to Meet You
description: A cute, casual puzzle game that will challenge your spatial reasoning with every turn of the dice.

name: Nested Lands
description: A ruthless settlement-survival RPG in a post-plague medieval world full of cruelty and despair. Gather survivors, build a settlement, craft, master your skills, survive, and endure alone or in online co-op.

name: Fallback!
description: Pixel art 2D shooter with a mix of basic Tower Defence.

name: Luminis: Heal Them All
description: In an alternate universe set in the futuristic era, a strange kind of virus is wreaking havoc in the wild. Explore, survive and heal the sick with a wide range of resources, equipments and advanced technology. Restore the world from sickness to health.

name: Project Volition
description:
Clara is an Internet shut-in. But when her world is invaded by the web, she must come out and face the code.

Invited by her friends to an abandoned computer company building in their small town, Clara is faced with strange visual hallucinations and whispers of ascension through the cyber. Find clues, talk to your friends, and explore the glitch-warped building in Project Volition.

name: Neon Nirvana
description: Become a supercharged comet in a retro universe inspired by the '80s! Find the black hole, devour asteroids, and escape destruction in "Neon Nirvana".

name: Wildmagic Wizardry
description: Wildmagic Wizardry is a Spell Mixing strategy rogue-like. Combine elements rolled on magical dice into powerful spells to fight your way through different enemy encounters. Collect unique items along your journey that will enhance your abilities and ensure that no two runs are the same.

name: Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins
description: Embark on an epic odyssey in Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins. Crafted by gods from their domains, floating realms await your exploration. Ascend in power, unveil secrets, and team up for dungeons, raids, and minigames. Unfold divine lore and become the most potent ascended god.

name: Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors
description: Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors is an FPS zombie-themed bullet hell game set in the Dead Zone universe. Use massive destruction guns to shred hordes of zombies! Improve your character with in-game improvements and skill tree training, and survive against bosses with various abilities.

name: Protocole: Hedera
description: You embody Hedera, a young test subject imprisoned in an inhumane experiment... Escape, free your fellow test subjects, use logic, draw on your empathy, control your emotions, and above all, use your psychic powers in this completely crazy action game!

name: FrozenPizza
description: Prepare to relive the golden era of FPS gaming while forging new friendships and creating unforgettable gaming memories. FrozenPizza serves up the best of both worlds in a visually stunning, community-driven adventure that will keep you hooked for hours.

name: Zombie Girl
description: This is an extremely thrilling and challenging third-person shooter. If you like shooting games and Zombie Crisis, then this game must not be missed! It will give you an immersive gaming experience, immersing you in a world full of danger and mystery.

name: Made in Melostead
description: Return to your hometown to run your shop by fulfilling commissions and selling wares. Choose your path as a blacksmith, alchemist, or woodworker and revive Melostead as you befriend neighbors, reform trade routes, and explore the world for exotic materials in this fantasy-inspired crafting sim RPG!

name: Sapiens Craft Puzzle
description: Begin as a small stone age tribe. End as a global super power in a future age. Craft your way through history!

name: Roots of Cinder
description: The doors of hell have been opened, and now demons walk the earth. Embark on an action-packed and mysterious adventure where you will have to confront the most dangerous enemies and solve the most intricate puzzles. All with the help of an extensive arsenal of weapons and summonings.

name: Dreaminal
description: Dreaminal is a 1-4 players surreal backrooms experience. Traverse through immersive and unique backrooms levels, experience anomalies, interact and solve puzzles while hiding from unknown entities in order to escape from the mysterious world of The Backrooms .

name: Mononoke no Kuni
description: Through free village building and boat trips, this 3D open-world action game adds the fun of discovering and exploring unknown islands, as well as the tension and strategy of roguelite dungeon crawling!

name: Musical Dominotes
description: An educational tile-based board game, the Musical Dominotes, is a twist on the classic dominoes game, where the dots are replaced by musical notes and rests that represent certain time values.

name: Partizan
description: Partizan is a brutal and satisfying action-oriented immersive sim set in a brutalist dystopia ruled by a oppressive regime. Rip and tear through militias, bureaucrats and gunked up quarantine zones until the world knows your name.

name: World of Yggdrasil
description: Become emperor, criminal or merchant in the world of Yggdrasil... Choose your path in the world of Yggdrasil!

name: Gunslinger Duel
description: Engage in turn-based quick draw battles against increasingly formidable opponents. Choose your next move, then in third person, draw and fire before your opponent does! An arcade-style strategy game in the Wild West. Are you a real gunslinger survivor, or another yellow-belly about to hit the dirt?

name: Furry Necromancer
description: You died, but I got good news and bad news for you. The good news - you have been resurrected, the bad news - you have been resurrected by a necromancer who has some "special" plans for you (although it might not be "bad news" at all...)

name: Express Hero
description:
Express Hero is a fun and engaging game that will test your problem-solving and time-management skill

Get ready to embark on the ultimate transportation adventure! In Express Hero, your goal is to navigate an intricate network of taxis, trains, and airplanes to reach your destination as quickly as possible. With each level, the challenge increases as roads, tracks, and air routes twist and turn, making it tricky to figure out the fastest way to travel. Can you master the maze of transportation and become the ultimate Express Hero?

name: The Wicked Souls
description: The Wicked Souls is a Metroidvania with a strong focus on an exciting and imaginative story. Explore the mysterious tower in the afterlife with the postman Bones and his mischievous companion Dietrich and uncover its secrets.

name: Machine Fable
description: Machine Fable is a modern Turned based RPG, with exploration, puzzle, and story rich elements, Smoof 8-Bit soundtrack, and a hand-drawn shiddy art style. It's funny, dumb, and sometimes plain stoopids, because "video game logic" you know, but at the same time brilliant...you know...know what I mean.

name: Scram: Scrammer's Pack
description: Elevate your gaming presence with the "Scrammer's Pack" DLC, where awesome hats and expressive customization options await, ensuring your virtual adventures are as unique as you are.

name: Bumpkin and Sprout
description: Embark on an unforgettable 3D platformer adventure in "Bumpkin & Sprout," where action, humor, and environmental awareness unite! Join these two whimsical mushrooms on a mission to save not only themselves but also Nature herself from the clutches of the nefarious Pollution Spirit.

name: Don't Destroy Your Friends
description: In this silly online cooperative game with birds, puzzles, and minigames, you'll work together with your friends to overcome any obstacle. But watch out! You will fail or succeed as one.

name: Project Warlock: Lost Chapters
description: Next Chapter of Project Warlock is here. A retro fps shooter that honors the legacy of classic shooters like Doom, Wolfenstein and Hexen picks up the story of Warlock mixing frantic gunplay, with powerful magic spells and perks and skills based character customisation.

name: Labyrinth
description: Labyrinth is a 2D platformer with pixel art graphics in which you will have to find your way through intricate labyrinths, overcome many enemies and deadly traps.

name: Dracula's Prey: A Nightmare in Rome
description: In this gloomy and mystifying first-person 2D horror game, help Sherlock Holmes chase down the murderous Count Dracula in the city of Rome! Over 7 nights, survive the unfolding nightmare in this world of creepy hand-drawn animations!

name: Beyond the Oaks
description: Trapped in Canada's boreal forest, in which futuristic technology and otherworldly horrors surround a 17th Century village, you must unravel the mystical open world's secrets in this third-person action-adventure game.

name: Tokeis
description: Tokeis is a board-like real-time city builder about growing your town from a tiny tile to a hexagonal empire. Collect tokens, manage resources, reorganize inefficiencies, and fortify your economy. Handle the harsh weather and defend against raiders trying to steal your riches!

name: Adventurer's Gambit: Dungeons of Fortune
description: Ascend the Tower! Create your hero, enter the endlessly varied dungeons alone, or team up with up to 3 friends to battle against 18 foes! Prevail by blade, magic, or curse... or join the bones rattling amidst the rubble. Are you up to the challenge? The Tower awaits!

name: Soulbond
description: Customize your fate in a fallen world: forge bonds and uncover secrets in a tale of power, love, and the weight of grief. Your choices define your path: how will you rise in the hierarchy of the damned?

name: Mars Colonization: Survival Simulator
description: Welcome to the Red Planet! Mars Colonization Survival Simulator offers you the opportunity to take on the role of the first pioneers of Mars. You will find yourself in extreme conditions with limited resources and your mission is to build, develop, sustain and explore the mysterious Martian terrain.

name: Against The Tide
description: Against The Tide is a simulation strategy game about restoring a dying coral reef. Build your conservation facility, grow your marine gardens, thwart invasive species, and discover new technologies to save the reef.

name: GeminiFlame: Alpha Dragon
description: You are the one!! Who came to this RPG world during a time of conflict among the local people. You have 4 character to take care and fight with the dragon and more?. What is happen? And What's wrong with them? Adventure to this world and discover it for yourself!!

name: Your Holy & Virtuous Heretic
description: A first-person, turn-based journey into the occult. Who will stand with Aleister at the end of days?

name: Happy! The Hippo
description: Welcome to Happy! the Hippo, a previously lost 3D platformer collectathon, now brought to life on modern hardware. Roll, bounce, and dive through a handful of enchanting worlds, tackling quests, rescuing frogs, and embracing the vintage charm of early 2000s gaming.

name: The Hauntings: Dark Passenger
description: Dive into Alex Mercer's twisted reality. Navigate eerie landscapes, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover the 'Dark Passenger' mystery. Will shadows consume you or will truth emerge?

name: Punch the Garden
description: Punch the Garden is a 2D action roguelike where you play as a young moustache that is entering a park. Within said park, you battle the merry residents and stop their cheerful dances! Get stronger as you progress and become a better moustache!

name: Metro Penguin Eutopia
description: Slaughter penguins and feel like a hero. Seriously—it’s the best job ever.

name: Jump4
description: Jump. This is not a suggestion.

name: Matt's Hidden Cats
description: A scavenger-hunt adventure that spans 80 hand-crafted levels, including beautiful holiday destinations and fantasy themes. Look in buildings, detonate bombs, unlock treasure chests, dig for secrets, and more! Every item is clickable as you search for Hidden Cats & Dogs!

name: Pro Football Agent
description: Welcome to our thrilling football agent game, where you have the opportunity to build a successful agency and manage the talented players on their journey to stardom. You'll have the power to attract players to your agency, negotiate contracts, and guide them to the top of the football world.

name: Sonyc
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Slug: Super Vehicle-001
description: A Game Boy Advance port was announced to be in development but was never released to the public.

name: Zelda: Sacred Paradox
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Diego Bros. 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Diego Bros.
description: Sin descripción

name: Phantom of the Black Rose Revue
description:
1974. Hyogo Prefecture, Japan.

The Black Rose Revue, an all-female musical theater troupe steeped in tradition and high esteem, has a new star on the rise. Twenty-two year old Chihiro Sato has quickly become the newest sensation for fans of the Revue. Sweet yet determined, Chihiro is ready to chase her dream: become the most famous musumeyaku in Japan.

But the theater, a sanctuary of glamour and brilliance, cradles shadows within its embrace. The corridors buzz with whispers of ghostly apparitions and ominous shadows, intensifying backstage tensions. As Chihiro steps deeper into the limelight, mysterious, increasingly obsessive letters begin to adorn her vanity, which grow steadily more obsessive with every message sent.

Will you sculpt a destiny steeped in unparalleled fame? Embark on a romance that will be sung through the ages? Or unearth secrets draped in shadows, whispering of forbidden truths? The threads of fate are in your hands, waiting to be woven into the tapestry of the unknown…

name: Corvian Curse
description: Corvian Curse is a roguelike platformer that offers a new experience on every run with randomized levels, potions, and items. Can you find and defeat the source of the curse that's causing the worlds to shift?

name: So Below
description:
A new beginning calls Anita Carver to another city, a new place to live, forget and grow. With all her familial and relationship traumas, getting used to this new life will be difficult. But company is right around the corner, be it good, evil or supernatural.

She is not sure what awaits in Holmes Hideway, but the unseen might have been waiting for her all this time.

name: 4xM
description: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U meets Melee. 4xM brings the Melee with overhauled gameplay, UI, and additional costumes.

name: Rip Van Bubsy
description: Bubsy ages 10 years every time he falls asleep. Can you solve the mystery of Bubsy? Unofficial fangame made in 7 days and released September 2009.

name: Claustrorush
description:
An infinite vertical 2D platformer where you control a little guy trying their best to escape an old crumbling tower !

The player must react quickly and grab wall-repelling runes as the walls are coming to limit the level and crush our round boi.

name: Waluigi's Wadventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Pépito Returned Home
description: Night-based horror game about.. Pépito the cat.

name: Tom vs. Jerry: The Chase is On!
description: Sin descripción

name: Spidy
description: Adventures of a young spider

name: Battlesmiths: Blade and Forge
description: Battlesmiths is a role-playing strategy game with a deep crafting system and tactical combat

name: Sempre
description: Rated E for Elevator Escape Experience.

name: City Panic!
description: Car chasing bird's eye view game.

name: Deutsch 1.-4. Klasse 2012
description: Sin descripción

name: Deutsch 1.-4: Klasse - Fit fuers Gymnasium
description: An edutainment game designed to teach the player Dutch.

name: Crystal Mines
description: Crystal mines DS is a game set in the distant future on a far-away planet where underneath the ground lies mines filled with crystals, monsters, rocks, black holes, lava, slime and cave-ins that will test your skills... You have decided to build your own mining robot to get the crystal riches that lay beneath the soil. You control your mining robot but using the keypad or (3DS: Also the Thumb Stick) and shoot blasts with your robots built in blaster that has unlimited reserve of energy using the A button and place explosives that you may find and collect in the mines using the B button. Along your adventure you will find many traps and hazardous objects that will require you too think twice before moving another inch... You will come across certain upgrades such as more powerful blaster shots or energy shields that will protect you from certain nasty’s. Also as you mine through the underground cavern you will encounter strange rock like creatures that not all will go down with a blaster bolt some require real strategy and complex thinking. Crystal Mines DS contains over 300 levels with bonus and secret levels to mine through and will really test you quick thinking, reflexes, intelligence and thumb power... Will you mine the last level???

name: Card Games: The Classics
description: A huge collection of the finest classic, solitaire and casino card games - right in your pocket!

name: Bibi Blocksberg: Grundschule Mathematik - Klasse 1 bis 4
description: It must be jinxed: Maths causes Bibi Blocksberg quite a headache! But luckily, she can count on her four friends Moni, Marita, Dennis and Florian. Each help Bibi in each respective form - and that's how practising turns into having fun. Assume Bibi's role and playfully learn arithmetic. By combining valuable exercises with a lot of fun the mathematics learning game helps primary school children deepen and broaden their proficiency and understanding of mathematics.

name: Crash vs. Spyro Racing
description: Crash vs Spyro Racing is a cancelled crossover racing game featuring characters from the Crash Bandicoot and Spyro series. The game was developed for the original Xbox by LT Studios.

name: Prison of Husks
description: Assume the form of a doll and make your way out of this decrepit prison. Like a crossbreed between Sekiro and Demon's Souls.

name: Brico Utile
description: Brico Useful on DS can learn to do DIY in a fun way using 28 cards. Different themes are evoked: laying on the floor, wall and ceiling installation, structural work, painting, decoration ... To complete the whole, photos are proposed, as well as a calculator, tips, mini-games and quiz.

name: Der Dativ ist dem Genitiv sein Tod
description: The bestselling phrasebook for Bastian Sick's cult column, now on the go! Is someone who is wrong on the wooden steamer, on the wrong way or on the wrong steamer? Is Brad Pitt considered the handsomest, best-looking, or best-looking movie star of our time? With the exciting Nintendo DS game "The dative is the genitive's death" based on the cult column by Bastian Sick, you can now explore the labyrinth of the German language while you're on the go! In the new game concept, specially developed for Nintendo DSTM, numerous new questions are available. In addition to the questions on German spelling, grammar, vocabulary and literature, four varied game variants provide a multitude of opportunities to put logical thinking, memory and skill to the test. Compete against other players in multiplayer or tournament mode and put your knowledge of the German language to the test! Features: The ultimate brain trainer: Gradually improves attention, reaction and memory skills Four fun game variants: Quiz, Logic, Memory and Skill Over 450 questions promote goal-oriented learning at school and in your free time Slip into the role of the little bookworm Willi and fight your way through the book labyrinth in 10 levels Improves multitasking ability Suitable for beginners as well as for professionals: Choose different levels of difficulty to answer tricky questions Over 4 million copies of the book series have been sold

name: Baby Wild Katzen
description: Baby wild cats can only be kept in the wild or in the zoo? Until now! With Baby Wildcats, young players can nurture, care for and spoil their very own sweet wildcat on the Nintendo DS. After choosing from eight different species - tiger, lion, panther, cheetah, puma, jaguar, white tiger and lion - players spend the whole day together with their darling: the little wild cat climbs trees, plays with balls of yarn in the garden, it being cuddled or romping around with toys. With the DS microphone, both listen to the radio or exciting bedtime stories. And if the kitten can't fall asleep, the players simply sing him a lullaby. Depending on how trusting it is, it can even learn fun tricks in the fitness room. But the little wildcat also needs attention and affection in other areas: great all-round care with a shower, hair dryer, grooming and of course a wildcat toilet in the bathroom, feeding in the kitchen, choosing suitable clothing, taking care of small ailments or gifts such as a new toy mouse for a birthday and room decorations. Fun with the cute baby wild cats is guaranteed! Features: * The first NDS game with a focus on cute baby wild cats * Nurture, nurture and pamper 8 species * Each wildcat baby develops its own character: from shy to rebellious * 6 environments to customize: from the bathroom to the garden * Use of microphone and stylus: sing lullabies, blow dry, caress... * Fun accessories to play with and dress up * Practice great tricks like somersaults...

name: ESmart 2.0
description: ESmart 2.0 (not to be confused with the previously preserved eCDP) was created with the purpose of training pre-existing employees in Japanese McDonald’s restaurants, and thus, these cartridges were never supposed to make it out into the general public.

name: Head North: The Inevitable
description: A contemplative single-player first-person action game, you're thrust into a world where evading relentless enemies is your sole chance at survival. Your lifeline? A flawed survival kit. Prepare for a slow-paced, tension-filled experience as you navigate a challenging terrain.

name: Ooparts
description: Previously unreleased brick smasher,

name: Bonzala
description: The idea is to collect all the hearts to complete the game. You will need to use the swing bridges which are operated by letting your flyer coast over the top of the black and yellow spinning discs, whereupon it will stop and your sideways direction controls will then operate the bridge. To leave the spinning disc, just press the forward button and your flyer will then be on it's way again.

name: Ninja Gaiden 3DS
description: Ninja Gaiden 3DS is a cancelled installment in the Ninja Gaiden series for the Nintendo 3DS. The game was announced at E3 2010, however was cancelled before release.

name: 3in1: Meine Tierpension + Meine Tierschule + Mein Westernpferd
description: Sin descripción

name: Twisted Tower
description: Bioshock meets Willy Wonka. Climb the Twisted Tower game show! Every deadly floor has a variety of paths to choose, horrifying enemies to slaughter, and clues about your dark past. Can you get to the top and win the heart of the love of your life?

name: V-Gunn
description: V-Gunn is a roguelike Vtuber fangame

name: Final Fantasy 2.0
description: "Final Fantasy 2.0" is a turn-based RPG inspired by the renowned Final Fantasy franchise. Explore a fantastical world, choose from a variety of unique classes, and engage in strategic battles. Dive into an epic adventure where imagination and strategy come together to create a captivating gaming experience. Moreover, you'll have the opportunity to traverse the worlds of other beloved franchises. This is a fan-made game, crafted with passion and admiration for the original series.

name: Pokemon Pyrite Version
description: Relive the adventure of the second generation Pokemon games in a more challenging and complete way! A hack of crystal with added trainers, updated maps, and the balancing of learnsets and wild pokemon and trainer scaling.

name: Patafour
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Dodgeball 3
description: Become the "Battle Ball King" in Battle Dodgeball 3, a bonus disc game released only with the Twin Battle Box, a special edition of Great Battle Fullblast, a game in the Compati Hero Series. It was released to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the Great Battle franchise. Like the other Compati Hero Series games, it prominently features characters from popular Japanese tokusatsu live-action shows and mecha anime, including Ultraman, Gundam, and Kamen Rider. The main game is a story mode that tells about a legendary dodgeball ("Battle Ball") tournament. During a time of peace, three mysterious artifacts appear from the ocean and a tournament is announced. The winner will be the one able to gather all of them and be crowned the new Battle Ball King. There is also a Super Battle League Mode, which will pit you against up to 15 different teams, or you can have practice versus matches in the Training Mode.

name: The Dog: Happy Life McDonald's Ver.
description: A version of The Dog: Happy Life that features exclusive McDonald's branded items and clothing. It was given out to customers at McDonald's.

name: Five Night At Freddy's: Security Breach - Glamrock Factory
description: You and your friend decide to go to the Megaplex Factory, to explore the premises and steal a few things. But not everything goes according to plan...

name: Bravo Music: Chou Meikyokuban
description:
One of three Japan-exclusive sequels to Bravo Music/Mad Maestro!
Bravo Music - Chou Meikyokuban: Your goal is to play four beautiful songs for the Martians who have already left Mars and are on their way to Earth! They will arrive in one week's time, so you have seven days to play four beautiful songs - even if you screw up the song, it counts as a day, so do your best!

In Child Mode you can choose from six planets, each leading to a different song.

name: Train Sim World 4: East Coast Main Line - Peterborough - Doncaster Route
description: Feel the high-speed thrill of British inter-city travel in Train Sim World 4! Express services await on the iconic East Coast Main Line, hurry between Peterborough and Doncaster, and through the English countryside, in the sleek and flashy LNER Azuma.

name: AutoMobile!
description: Play this AutoMobile! game to find out how many automobile logos you recognized.

name: Bad Roads Go
description:
You need to arm yourself with patience, dexterity and luck to safely climb hills, descend on steep slopes and overcome all the obstacles you encounter on your way.
The goal? Go as far as possible with your shipment. But beware, if you end up dropping all of your boxes, you will only have to return to the starting point.
With different landscapes and its cars ready to unlock, "Bad Roads Go" is a game that will delight all players looking for a casual, fun and original game.

name: Montessori Numberland
description: Let your child embark on an adventure to Numberland with Tam and Tao, our cute characters! Each number is set in a beautiful animated scene where kids get to count and interact with the mountains, the trees, the birds, and even the stars. In Numberland a lot of surprises await the young learner. Your child can already count to more than 10 ? The app contains lots of fun activities and games to learn numbers in new languages.

name: Baby Frogs
description: Baby Frogs are cute curious creatures and love to hop, crawl & jump around but there is danger to them everywhere. Your job is to keep each frog safe, where you can see them and from dangers of hungry fish, attacks from birds of prey and just getting stuck in mud. These and many more dangers can take your baby frogs from you. Dragonflies can distract you from your task. Rocks and cattails can steer your frogs into trouble. There are 30 different frogs to discover and more to come. Collect them all!

name: iWarehouse: World Tour
description:
Can you explore and break down the puzzle world? Well then, get stocking for a tour.
iWarehouse is one of the best adventure puzzle game on the app store which will surely test your problem solving abilities.

name: Capsman
description: Capsman is arrived, its mission is to collect as many beans and biodegradable capsules, and whoever plays with Capsman must overcome obstacles and escape from imaginary enemies, that in each level will be more tricky!

name: Stickbound
description:
Stickbound offers an innovative stick jumping mechanic that's brand new on the iPhone/iPod Touch.
Touch the screen to extend your stick and propel yourself just like a pole vault. The longer you touch, the longer your stick will be.
The angle and placement of your stick determines the speed and trajectory of your jump, so act fast!

name: Prize Machine
description:
Visit Prize City and try your luck on the prize machines! Find rare prizes! Collect full prize sets! Advance in levels to unlock new locations! You can do it all!
Win game tickets! Play scratch off games! Spend tickets on toys and prizes in the Ticket Exchange!
Try your luck on the Prize Wheel!

name: Rolling Jump
description:
Help Lighty save the light of the world by escaping from the dark evil creatures in this incredibly FUN and ADDICTING game! Simply jump from each wheel up into the sky and stars to protect the light of the world.
In Rolling Jump, your goal is to help the hero, Lighty, jump up into the sky and away from the dark evil creatures as fast as possible.
Learn secrets of the game like double tapping, jumping onto walls, and discover how to attain the rainbow path to help Lighty save the light of the world, and ultimately prove his worth.

name: Yoku-Gami
description:
Yoku-Gami is a unique, challenging and addictive game. This easy to learn game is from the mind of award winning game designer Dr. Reiner Knizia. The rules are very straight forward so anyone can play, learn, have a blast and exercise their mind.
Join Yoki in this endless fun loving game which is idea for the whole family. Simply clear the numbers from the board and make your next move. Stuck? No worries, just tap Yoki and he will show you the right combination.

name: Ant Work
description: Help ant to sort the barrels. Use arrows to navigate the ant. Finish level to unlock next one. 24 levels are waiting for you. You can set the difficulty level and see how many moves have been done. Ant Work is a simple logical game for everyone.

name: Ham on the Run!
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Sim World 2: New Journeys - Silver 1972 Stock
description: Relive the classic days of the Underground, take on new challenges and explore more on Bakerloo Line with Train Sim World 2: New Journeys - Silver 1972 Stock.

name: Train Sim World 3: Niddertalbahn - Bad Vilbel - Stockheim Route Add-On
description: Take to the rails of Germany with no wires in sight! Experience diesel traction from a bygone era, and shuttle along the picturesque fields and rivers of Hesse in TSG's authentic 1990s recreation of Niddertalbahn: Bad Vilbel - Stockheim for Train Sim World 3!

name: Train Sim World 4: Antelope Valley Line - Los Angeles - Lancaster Route
description: Experience the hefty power of modern American diesel! Tackle the tough terrain of Californian canyons with the Antelope Valley Line, between the sprawling Los Angeles cityscape and desert bushes of Lancaster in almighty Metrolink traction.

name: Train Sim World 4: S-Bahn Vorarlberg - Lindau - Bludenz Route
description: Take the train to Austria! Spanning cross-border, the busy Vorarlberg S-Bahn line shuttles from quaint German island life to the foothills of the Austrian Alps. All-new and bustling ÖBB traffic awaits in Train Sim World 4.

name: 81diver
description:
In the world of Shogi (Japanese Chess), there are professional players who make their living at the game and gamblers who play Shogi for money. In Hachi-One Diver, gamers take the latter tack and play Shogi against an assortment of opponents who vary in their level of skill and attitude.

Based on the manga by Shibata Yokusaru which was made into an 11-episode television series, Hachi-One Diver on the PS2 features a Story Mode where players take on the role of Sugata Kentarou who possesses a decidedly blank visage. Sugata was once a promising student at the Shogi Player Foundation but he faltered and failed at his dream. Nowadays, he has taken the role of a Shogi gambler who earns his keep by facing opponents in Shogi parlors and contests. But he is devastated when he is beaten completely by a young woman known as "Ukeshi" who takes any challenges and never loses. As Shogi means everything to him, he decides to train himself harder to become the strongest player.

The Story Mode of the game follows Sugata's trials as he plays Shogi against a steady parade of competitors. By beating certain opponents, Sugata faces new challengers based on his performance. Hachi-One Diver also features a Versus Mode, a 2-Player Mode, and a Shogi School Mode that teaches newbies the basics of the game.

name: Royal Block
description: Step into the fast-paced arena of RoyalBlock.to, a competitive block-based Battle Royale game. Players worldwide align and clear blocks, strategizing to outlast their opponents in a grid showdown. Crafted by a dedicated solo developer, RoyalBlock.to offers a unique and refreshing twist on classic puzzle mechanics. With a commitment to regular updates and a completely free-to-play model, this game is a testament to passion-driven development. Dive in, challenge yourself, and see if you have the strategic prowess to be the last player standing.

name: Instant Sport Summer + Winter
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Smash Kart
description: Super Smash Kart is a rom hack for Mario Kart 64 developed by Goofydudeguya. The game is based around the Super Smash Bros. series and features characters and locations based around various Nintendo franchises such as Zelda and F-Zero.

name: The Fall of the Dungeon Guardians: Enhanced Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Avy, Fables of the Night
description: Jump, glide, grab and throw items, push objects, make new friends and defeat your fears in dialogue-based battles to escape from the adorable nightmare island.

name: Angel of Death
description: Helm the guns of the most fearsome gunship in the world—Introducing the most immersive AC-130 game on the market (and the only one in VR)!

name: Amygdala: Prelude
description: Dragged into a dark conspiracy, explore and survive your way through the beginning of the end for the nation of Australia. Use your wits and instinct to stay alive in this 2000s-style first person liminal exploratory horror shooter set down under during the 1990s.

name: Chill of Death's: Breath
description: "Step into the world of the mafia with Chill of Death's: Breath, delve into the depths of the underworld. Immerse yourself in the shadows of crime, prove your presence amidst intrigue and desire. Embark on a journey where you can create an impact and leave a lasting impression."

name: Chasmal Fear
description: Chasmal Fear is a next-gen FPS action horror game built in Unreal Engine 5 from the perspective of a body camera. Manage limited resources, make smart choices which affect your playthrough and survive monsters that mutate to get stronger. Played as singleplayer or Co-Op with 2 players.

name: Cursed Silence
description: "Cursed Silence" is a relentless plunge into the abyss of psychological horror. Can you confront unfathomable terrors and uncover the mystery shrouding Emily, or will you succumb to the chilling embrace of the void where reality and dreams collide?

name: Cyber-Assassin
description: The Cyber-Assassin will be awoken. Coming soon is an epic single-player game that combines hack and slash with third person shooter, all set in a cyberpunk inspired open world.

name: Dunchess
description: Master the art of turn-based chess mechanics in ever-changing dungeons! Navigate bridges, teleporters, and more as you strategize your way to victory in this unique chess roguelike adventure. Plus, create your own maps and explore others' creations!

name: Dr. Bowow's Eco-Extraction
description: Puzzle with the master mogul in Dr. Bowow’s Eco-Extraction! Build Factories, Laboratories, and Mines to gather resources – nevermind the environmental hazards. Keep it clean, keep it orderly, and above all, keep it profitable!

name: Divine Frequency
description: A bewildering tale of a trashcan hobo's rise to becoming the universe's most effective security software.

name: Delivery Life Simulator
description: Delivery is difficult. Any type of delivery is more difficult. Become the best in package delivery by climbing all the steps! Buy the most luxurious cars and houses. So, in this simulation and open-world game, join us on a delivery journey that begins with an old bike!

name: Cream Party
description: Come join the fun-filled ice cream battle! Immerse yourself in a fast-paced and absurdly hilarious adventure. Activate random power-ups, take advantage of terrain bonuses, showcase your unique fighting style, and unlock uproarious ways to win!

name: FuriusAO
description: From the beginning of the game, each character has a race that determines their physical form and a class that determines what they excel at in the game. Throughout the game, each player's character learns skills that will determine how successful (or not) they will be at their craft.

name: Glyphen
description: Glyphen is an Immersive Spellcasting Adventure in which you draw mysterious Glyphs to cast spells. Glyphs have meanings and can be combined to invoke complex magic. Draw Glyphs, create spells and become a mage.

name: Gravity Break
description: Physics-based single-player space adventure about discovering ultimate freedom in the Solar System while the Earth is burning.

name: Garden Of Coolembozo
description: Garden of Coolembozo is a top down shooter where you die in one hit and its pretty hard!

name: Kekdot Center
description: Kekdot Center is a fun and challenging multiplayer obstacle/parkour game in which players will have to find their way to the finish. Players can take a short break in the Plaza where they can socialize with others in the form of text chat and voice chat.

name: Join Our Cult n Chill
description: Recruit villagers, cook tasty foods, and unravel mysteries in this 2D adventure on a remote Island!

name: InController
description: InController is a 4-player couch co-op within a couch co-op. Work with your teammate to control your onscreen controller by running and jumping over the buttons on your teams controllers (you can even mess with the other teams controls!) to control your teams character in the selected game.

name: Hyperspace Nebula
description: Explore an ever-changing galaxy, upgrade your ship, and face cosmic challenges in this thrilling 2D roguelike adventure. Become a legend of the galaxy in Hyperspace Nebula.

name: Hollow Mine
description: Hollow Mine is a roguelike hack-and-slash dungeon crawler. Explore mysterious mines where levels are generated randomly every play. Fight enemy hordes and tough bosses. You can choose from various weapons and abilities to upgrade your character and create your own combination.

name: Monkee Game
description: Monkee Game is an endless climber party game. Play with up to 8 players co-op or pvp and try and stay on the screen. Grab and use items to either hinder or help your friends as you all scale upwards!

name: Late Stage
description: Late Stage is a stealth action game where you play as a mercenary, completing missions for megacorporations

name: Privateer
description: Privateer is a non-linear, single-player action RPG filled with space battles and shootouts. It’s a must-play game for anyone who enjoys 3rd person action-packed adventures in space.

name: Plant Trader
description: Plant Trader is a 2D time-management economical game where you act as a gardener who buys seeds and grows plants, and then, before they rot, has to sell at a bargain price and make a huge fortune, buying even more expensive plants!

name: Pixel Princess Arena
description: Pixel Princess Arena is a Single Player Auto Battler. Strategically place your heroes, empower them with unique items and blessings, build your team, and save the princess!

name: Pixel Petals
description: Pixel Petals: Relax with 2D pixel flowers. Crossbreed to unlock vibrant colors, complete quests, and create your tranquil pixel garden.

name: Otter Turmoil
description: Play as an Otter in this Rogue-lite action shooter. Mow down through hordes of goons and enemies as you traverse through Panda's Box. Loot among many guns and powerups to conquer the new world.

name: Normal Fishing
description: Normal Fishing is a retro-handheld-inspired adventure where everything goes exactly as expected, and there is absolutely nothing to worry about. Explore the lake, chase and catch fish in frantic minigames, and uncover a much deeper, darker secret in this experimental indie horror adventure.

name: RollmeHome
description: Roll the character with the rudder and jump. As usual, it's a space bar It has simple manipulation, but it's not going to be an easy challenge Understand the physics of things and explore the silhouette.

name: Super Mu
description: Super Mu is an original Shoot 'em Up. Through the 7 levels, face your enemies, become stronger and fight for your destiny.

name: VikingScape
description: A viking themed puzzle/escaperoom.

name: ThisIsTheGame
description: Return to an old game project that you once abandoned, only the game hasn’t stopped changing since you left it. The game has begun to evolve, NPCs have slowly started to abandon their intended rolls, new bugs have emerged, and the morality of this world is becoming questionable.

name: The Mothering
description: Step into the ethereal realm of The Mothering, a hauntingly unique game where you must care for forgotten souls in the afterlife. Can you assist the aging Mother and ensure the spirits' needs are met before it's too late?

name: Texnoplazm
description: Gun fu action centered on three intertwined movesets for punches, ranged weapons and firearms. Fight your enemies through the gothic metropolis while using their weapons against them, in the most acrobatic way possible.

name: The Dark Cowboy
description: Embark on a spine-chilling first-person horror adventure, exploring a haunting mountain wilderness, as you relentlessly hunt down the outlaws who murdered your family. Uncover hidden mysteries and escape from the grips of unspeakable otherworldly nightmares in this harrowing odyssey.

name: The Goblinseekers
description: The Goblinseekers is a Cozy Graphic Adventure, with RPG elements and a careful narrative. Live immersive self-contained adventures, solve puzzles, make potions, collect items, unveild mysteries and meet unique characters, which will take you through different endings.

name: Whirlwind Magician
description: Experience the tale of a cheerful girl and a grouchy talking hat in this charming Metroidvania, where every ability is hat-based! Throw the hat to attack enemies, teleport to him to make perilous leaps, and fly him through narrow tunnels of spikes as you escape a dangerous magic forest.

name: Let's go! Brave
description: Let's go! Brave is a 2D action adventure game in the dark fantasy style of Galaxy Warrior Demon City, featuring sexy characters and lively battles. Its unique purification gameplay is also exhilarating, and of course, it also has a gripping storyline

name: Rewritten Recalls
description: Step into the dark corners of the world as Detective Thomas, confronting fears unknown to many. Every time the shadow of death descends upon you, you have the chance to begin anew, gathering clues and revealing secrets. Death is no longer the end but a new beginning.

name: Strong man parkour
description: A parkour game, mainly for leisure, featuring the operation of a fierce man, using jumping and running walls to reach the pinnacle of life.

name: Edge of Realm
description: A Touhou fan game and a 2D pixel shooting survival game, telling the story of Renko looking for her friend Merry in the destroyed Gensokyo, finding the truth about the destruction of Gensokyo and saving the world.

name: Forest Life
description: Step into this living, breathing world of nature and explore this magnificent environment where every tree and plant lives its life. Start your adventure to explore the cave networks and mysterious underground lakes that lie deep underground.

name: Abscess
description: A game about giving.

name: Ma Cheon Ru
description: Shanghai style Mahjong Korean game.

name: Lustrous Spirit
description: Lustrous Spirit is a game based off of Land of the Lustrous/Houseki no Kuni, where you can explore the world of the series and see where events took place.

name: Invaders From Uranus
description:
Invaders from Uranus is a a Retro First Person Shooter inspired by the "Halo" series where you must fight against little evil pink aliens to protect Earth! In the not too distant future, aliens invade earth. The evil aliens are set on one thing, the destruction of mankind. You, and your squad of highly trained soldiers, must defend Earth at all costs.

Equip an assault rifle, heavy pistol, sniper rifle, shotgun, or even captured alien technology to bring down enemy infantry and aircraft!

Aliens are much more advance than humans. Their plasma weapons burn through the toughest of armors and their shields block even the fastest projectiles. Use your surroundings , weapons, and squad mates to strategically defeat your foes.

name: Cross The Ridge R
description: Initial D/Ridge Racer type game.

name: Kaleido Festival
description: Kaleido Star Fangame.

name: Prize Tetris
description: Gambling form of Tetris.

name: Prize Space Invaders
description: Distinct gambling version of Space Invaders with heavy play costs.

name: Dreadnoughts of Caelus
description: Dreadnoughts of Caelus is a first-person 3D action flight sim. Pilot small, agile fighters to destroy a huge, fully-destructible dreadnought from space before it reaches your city, floating in the blue-green mist of a distant sky planet.

name: Conquest Manager
description:
Fantasy, strategy, board game with trading cards. Customize your deck and conquer creatures appearing on your path belong with your foe. Dive into strategy and planning to show who is the real conqueror, foes awaits you.
Collect cards, manage your deck and play a tabletop game with cards!

name: Avalon
description: Avalon is an MMORPG built in Unreal 5 with support of blockchain technology . Set in a fantasy medieval kingdom, players utilize their characters to explore a world of danger and mystery while competing for rare NFT rewards, players retain full ownership of their in game items.

name: Clash: Heroes of Feralia Terra
description: A third-person survival Hack 'n' Slash Shooter, set in a world besieged by cosmic alien creatures. As the final hope of your world, you shall venture forth alone as a Feral warrior to confront the hordes of deadly cosmic foes and formidable bosses, striving to survive and save your world.

name: Leap Sheep!
description:
Leap Sheep! is a fast and fun action game for all ages where players compete on Plus+ for high scores and woolly awards by leaping an ever growing flock of sheep over a fence!
Tap the cute fuzzies to jump them over the fence (they're not smart enough to do it on their own you know). Tap them again while in the air to make them do a trick. Perform tricks to earn Rams. Send out Rams to bash stuck sheep over the fence. Stack too many sheep against the fence and you lose. Successful leap streaks increase your points multiplier, earning you outrageous scores!

name: Steam'd Roller
description: How many moles can you roll? Steer with the crank in this Playdate game.

name: EndlessRunner
description: This is a Endless Runner game which is an addictive game for ages 3+

name: My Talking Dog 2
description: Help your talking friend create a perfect world of his own – customize his fashion style, hair, the interior design of his home and play incredibly cute mini games with him meanwhile. Besides just playing with your virtual pet Charlie II, you have to feed him, bathe him, brush his teeth, take him to the rest room, take care of him when having a cold and help him fall asleep. This talking dog deserves royal treatment and you are the one who can do it better than anyone else! You'll also be the one he will grow up with as his best friend!

name: WW2 Zone War: Cold Warzone Ops
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Invasion: FPS Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Staff!
description: Sin descripción

name: Match Manor
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow Labyrinth
description: Sin descripción

name: Rogue Slasher
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Play: Ragdoll Sandbox
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Ultima
description: Sin descripción

name: Demolition Derby Multiplayer
description: Sin descripción

name: Animal Adventure Downhill Rush
description:
Winter is coming, snow is everywhere! It brings that same Christmas mood. So let's start the beautiful journey with the new game.
Grab your sleds and snow slide along the winter horizons. Discover the new places, rush through the cities, villages, snowy mountains, frozen rivers, avoid the running bears and car drivers. Collect gifts and a lot of various items like the rush bonuses, energy sparks, bombs and so on. Unlock new sledges, new animals (fox, rabbit, wolf and a lot of more), new sledge details, new various levels, set up new worldwide records, unlock various achievements and have a lot of fun!

name: Wormi
description:
An Apple iPad game for up to four players
Have you ever heard about a game called Snake?
Wormi brings well-proven game concept from an amazing 80s video game called SNAFU to a modern age with a twist.
Wormi was designed with local play in mind, with extensive options in single-player mode you can play solo or compete with three other friends simultaneously on one device thanks to precise and responsive controls.

name: Link and Spell
description:
Link and Spell is a mashup of the classic snake and boggle games.
Form words by eating the red letters that spawn on the playfield.
Change the snake’s direction by swiping.
Avoid hitting the white tiles and stay within the playfield bounds.
Double tap anywhere to commit your word.
Valid words earn you points, extra time and clear the playfield from white tiles.

name: Battle of Words
description: Battle of Words is a Taboo game, or in another words simple, addictive, incredibly funny word guessing party game.

name: The Lost Tomb
description: Explore different locations, collect useful items and solve intriguing puzzles in this escape adventure.

name: Pokecolo
description: Pokecolo is a japanese free-to-play social mobile game released by Cocone on September 2011 for iOS and Android. The game features a gacha system, used to obtain clothing for your "mini" and decorations for the planet and its interior to customize however you like. You can raise pets, trade items, cook food for your mini, and chat with others.

name: BREAKERS: Unlock the World
description: Breakers: Unlock the World is an animation RPG in development for PC and smartphone at Vic Game Studios. It is an all-new, original title that depicts the story of the journey to the “Library of God” at the farthest end of the earth where all knowledge of the world is accumulated. The journey of the characters, brought to life through cel-shaded rendering, will invite you to a gameplay experience that feels like playing an anime.

name: Big Heavy
description: Big Heavy is a demanding 2D souls-like boss rush. Roll, block, hack, and slash your way to freedom from the clutches of the Sadist King. Only 11 colossal brutes stand in your way. Will you escape with your life or become another victim of the arena?

name: Aurora Nova
description: Aurora Nova is a Roguelike deckbuilder with a hint of rpg elements. Instead of a fantasy world - like in the excellent Slay the Spire, Roguebook, Banners of Ruin, or Across the Obelisk (to name a few) - Aurora Nova is a scifi, story-driven journey that takes place in the distant future.

name: Agame
description: Agame is a competitive FPS where teamwork and strategy. A competitive first-person shooter that thrives on strategic teamwork. Climb the ranks for thrilling gameplay that rewards precision and collaboration. Discover the essential appeal of Agame—a must-play for FPS enthusiasts.

name: Bullet Frenzy
description: “Bullet Frenzy” is a strategy game that combines deck building and role-playing. In the game, you will play different roles in a magical western world, explore various interesting places, collect and combine various powerful cards,defeat various enemies with magic bullets

name: Counter Ops: Blackout Assault
description: "Counter Ops: Blackout Assault" - FPS action vs. global terrorists. 20+ missions, 4 unique locations, 11 upgradable weapons, 6 secret missions. Defuse bombs, rescue hostages, act fast against the clock! Engage in intense battles, be the hero!

name: Dead Humanity
description: "Dead Humanity" first person It is a horror game. You too can join this adventure. A tense story, rich graphics and themes that question the depths of human nature make the "Dead Humanity" game unforgettable. How far will you go to survive in this post-apocalyptic world?

name: Down There Somewhere
description: Can you survive ?A small submarine is sent to the depths of the ocean for research. But an unidentified creature attacks the submarine. You know that the rescue team will send a new submarine in about 10 hours. Can you survive 10 hours in the dark depths of the ocean?

name: Dokis World
description: This world is filled with Dokis, little robots with a big job, to cleanse the world of its toxicity and stabilise the ecosystem, and you’ve taken on the task to help them, because there are somethings little Dokis can’t fix.

name: Engraving
description: Uncover the eerie secrets of a forest graveyard trapped in time in Engraving. Chart your way through a shifting natural labyrinth using hand-drawn maps and confront the enigmatic spirits haunting this somber world.

name: FrostFire: Battle Frenzy
description: This is FrostFire -Battle Frenzy-, a 2D anime fighting game perfect for new and experienced players of the genre.

name: Figurality
description: Figurality - A game with a choice of actions, by controlling the mouse cursor you must guide it to the correct figure before you hit the wall, the further you progress the more difficult the figures become.

name: Funset Studios
description: The Funset Studios Studio Tour is finally open. Try your luck on the Jungle Jammer's Jungle Gym. Get your own Golden Gaia Medallion And meet everyone's favorite TV Hippo: FUMBO!

name: Geometric Link
description: A thrilling fusion of survivor-like, tower defense, and roguelike challenges. Strategically build and upgrade your turrets to fend off relentless masses of enemies. Unlock new content, conquer epic boss battles, and prove your strategic prowess in this endless battle for survival!

name: Fareast Four Season: Hello World
description: Fantasy partners are a good medicine for dealing with psychological trauma. But when partners move from behind the scenes to the front stage, it will only add troubles to social interaction.

name: Hot Homework Help
description: Kelly is an uninterested university student living with a wealthy mother, lacking knowledge. She's trying to befriend you, the top student. Assist her with exams, but remember she may want to repay you differently.

name: Gunman Contracts: Stand Alone
description: "Gunman Contracts - Stand Alone" is an action-movie inspired shooter playable both in VR and in Non-VR (First Person). As a professional hitman, the player takes on ruthless forces in the criminal underworld, bringing justice and order in the world beyond the reach of law - one contract at a time.

name: Indoors
description: All kind of unsolved horrors from all around the world are just a door away. INDOORS is a single-player horror anthology game developed by Snova where your puzzle solving abilities will take you through 7 paranormal escape rooms.

name: House of Everlast
description: A mystifying puzzle game that weaves a profound tale exploring the essence of life and family bonds. Immerse yourself in the narrative, as it unfolds through the eyes of Nala, a young girl trapped within a haunted house, accompanied by an unexpected ally, Mr. G.

name: Greenfield
description: Greenfield is a story driven puzzle-platforming adventure game. Explore a forgotten island facility and acquire abilities from its lost technologies to unlock a path to its center, where the answers to a dark mystery await.

name: Mythstal: Shadow of the Sun
description: Experience new life breathed into a tried-and-true formula. Mythstal: Shadow of the Sun is a fast-paced, turn-based RPG with a focus on quick thinking and fluid team building. Revive the world around you to grow your arsenal, your team, and your skills, in a frantic race against a fading world.

name: Light Cry
description: It was the worst day of his life. The car hit Damon. Damon, in a coma, was on the thin line between life and death. To wake up from his coma, Damon had to win the battle with himself.

name: Love Connect
description: If you are lonely and bored at home alone, little brother, come and play with me. If you win, you will be given the reward that a man wants.

name: Mainasutto: I'm Not Alone
description: Mainasutto: I'm Not Alone is a metroidvania about time and choice-making, set on a dream-like world, where decision making is crucial for our protagonists to save their timeline.

name: Meet Me on the Mountain
description: When letters from an unknown figure arrive in Julia's mailbox, she unravels a forgotten, painful truth behind it. Witness a unique narrative experience illustrated in a series of hand-painted scenes that tell the story of Julia and a familiar stranger that lives inside her fractured memories.

name: Microbial Mayhem
description: Dive into the vibrant and perilous microcosm within the human body in Microbial Mayhem. As a pathogen, your mission is clear: infiltrate and conquer, all while the immune system relentlessly defends its host.

name: Island of Mogambo
description: Island of Mogambo is a fast paced run-n-gun game that pays homage to the legendary Contra series while taking the action to new heights. Blast through waves of relentless enemies, navigate treacherous terrain, and tackle epic boss battles in a pixelated retro world.

name: Prison Gang Wars
description: Take control of the gritty underworld as the mastermind of a powerful prison gang. Rise through the ranks, build your empire, and establish dominance in the unforgiving world of maximum security.

name: Ravenwood Acres
description: Ravenwood Acres is a relaxed fantasy reimaging of the farm sim genre. Write your own story in this vibrant frontier town; your life is at your fingertips. Will you train to become a legendary crafter, brave the wilderness as an adventurer, or live a quiet life on the farm?

name: Ravenous Horde
description: Kill hordes of zombies as a hunter, and kill hunters when you're a zombie! In this round based multiplayer post-apocalyptic FPS you start as a hunter, and turn into a zombie when you die. Level up and unlock perks, new weapons and customization options!

name: Puzzle toys
description: Leisure puzzle game

name: PowerWash Adventure
description: In PowerWash Adventure, you are a magical janitor on a whimsical rinsing journey across different themes. Upgrade your water gun to flash away dirts and restores items to their original states. Enjoy varied scenarios in dream mode, clean graffiti or design your own unique stage to share with others.

name: Riders Republic: Skate Plus Pack
description: With the Riders Republic Skate Plus Pack, it's time for you to show off your skateboarding skills. Take your riding experience up a notch by adding skateboards and a hoverboard to your game.* *Riders Republic is required to play this extension.

name: Online Obsession
description: Have you ever had an online friend? What if you were to meet them in real life? Can you be sure that nothing will go wrong? Find out in this horribly adorable experience.

name: Palesuckers
description: Follow the story of the very first vampire, who this pale "nobody" is, and why there's a growth on his neck. If things weren't already confusing, he comes across a horde of demons, ghouls, and zombies that he must fight off as he figures out what is happening.

name: Square Word: Hello Winter!
description: Square Word is coming on Steam! Discover 140+ words spread in 4 chill themes! Handcrafted grids, hints, mini-objectives & more!

name: Snow Question
description: Snow Question is a 2D math game where a math teacher is stuck in a snowball that you play as. He is trying to guess the right direction with his calculations. Try to steer the coma towards the snowflake with the correct solution to the equation.

name: Soulless Steel
description: Build your mecha. Fight. Learn the enemy. Upgrade. Fight again. A singleplayer top down, exploration, tactical shooter with mechas. Climb the ranks, side with factions, and try to be the best mecha pilot this world has ever seen.

name: Speedy Guys
description: Oh no! Guy has just learned his local pub is closing down! Run fast, fly high as Guy and friends attempt to collect as much money as possible to save the pub!

name: Roc's Odyssey
description: Explore vast landscapes and get lost in a beautiful yet dangerous world in Roc's Odyssey. Filled with intense combat, strange allies, platforming, enemies, treasures, secrets, upgrades, friendships and lore this hand drawn action adventure will have you hooked!

name: Survival Bunker
description: Survival Bunker puts you as a lone survivor in a post-apocalyptic world. Manage an underground bunker, gather resources, and face various threats. Your choices have consequences, and death is not the end; a family member will take over.

name: The Monk
description: The Monk is an epic adventure in the cyberpunk world. Blood, implants, brutality and fights. That all you can try by yourself

name: The Smile Friends
description: You are an employee of a school that closed three years ago. Now, you have been anonymously invited to explore the premises, but apparently, you are not alone from the school...

name: Timagi
description: Master magic and slow motion in this action-packed top-down shooter. It is time to stand up to the danger and use time to your advantage. The fate of the kingdom rests in your hands.

name: Usher.
description: Horror puzzle/exploration game where you'll have to uncover a horrifying truth about a mysterious island. Use combat and movement mechanics to explore a small island and pact withs strange gods to unlock new habilities.

name: VanBay: Mosh it Up
description: An extraordinary voxel-based RPG that transports players to the mesmerizing world of Vanbay, a city where music isn't merely a form of expression—it's the source of potent enchantments and profound mysteries. Thrust into a world of pulsating beats and magical auras.

name: Wanted Wizard 2
description: Simple controls, simple system. A 2D action RPG that anyone can easily and enjoyably play! Travel around the country with the cheeky black cat, fight powerful enemies with the power of magic, and uncover the mysteries of the Isol Kingdom!

name: Crashimals
description: Crashimals is a first person arena shooter, wave defense, zombie survival, mission grind where you take on stylized cartoon animals and fight to the death!

name: Fiend
description: Quickly dig graves and run for your life while solving puzzles to solve the mystery of the Wendigo

name: eSudoku 15K
description: The ultimate numerical challenge LCD game, play Sudoku on the go.

name: Death Fighter V.2
description: Sharp game, similar to Street Fighter

name: Hard Battle
description: Hard Battle is a bizarre shooter for the sharp x68000 where the main ship is the 68k itself.

name: Game de Check! Koutsuu Anzen
description: Game de Check! Koutsuu Anzen is an educational game that was commisionned by a Japanese insurance company, and was never actually on sale. They made a couple of hundred copies, and would lend the game, along with a Master System, to primary schools that requested it.

name: The Fighting Wolf AT
description: Belt scrolling beat em up for MSX.

name: Dead Horizon
description: An adventure game that mixes rail shooter elements into a world of sand, dust, and blood. You play Bonnie Star, former murderous gunslinger now turned carnival sideshow act, as she tries to find redemption at the end of a gun.

name: Lips: Deutsche Partyknaller
description: Lips: Deutsche Partyknaller is a localized version of Lips: Number One Hits for German-speaking countries. It was released in Germany, Austria and Belgium. The game itself is identical to Number One Hits, but the track list consists largely of German songs. Downloadable content from other Lips games can be carried over and songs can be imported by swapping the discs. The disc comes with 40 songs:* 2raumwohnung - Besser Geht's Nicht

name: Izuna
description:
The kunoichi Izuna returns to the modern era!

Izuna: Legend of the Unemployed Ninja, a Japanese-style dungeon RPG previously released on DS, has begun development on Switch and PC (Steam) with a new look!

Please look forward to seeing what form Izuna will take after for 16 long years!

name: Hidden Object: NYC Detective Horror Story - Gold Version
description:
Why are these mafia bosses disappearing? More importantly, where are the children disappearing to?
New York, the year is 1955. It's become dangerous in the city. The mafia is trying to seize power. But recently, a new force appeared. A far more terrible force. Over the last few days, five mafia bosses have disappeared in mysterious circumstances. A strange liquid and a butterfly were found at the scenes of the disappearances. But this isn't what scared the citizens... Children started to disappear in the city. All of them drew exactly the same butterflies before they disappeared. This forced detectives and journalists alike to start their investigations.

name: Doomsday III: Base Ganymede
description:
General Arcade proudly presents new old school shooter for Doom fans: Doomsday III: Base Ganymede.
Doomsday III based on community project Freedoom and source code of Doom Classic. Freedoom resources is adapted to iPhone and iPod Touches, you will have more weapons, items and power-ups. All our work will be contributed back to the community.

name: Balance the Bottle
description:
Lift the bottle from below with your finger and see how long you can balance it.
Use randomly collected stars to buy presents and unlock more fun things to balance – like a kitty, a volcano and even… a magic hat!

name: Vicky Adventure Shanghai
description:
Victoria finds in his grandfather archeologist's attic an old map and a note to this map, which describes how to find the lost Atlantis! Victoria offers his friend Steve a journey in search of Atlantis!
You go to the most exciting journey you can only imagine, along with Victoria and her friend Steve. Victoria and Steve's adventure story covers 5 continents of the earth and has 5 series (a sequel). Each story has its own unique level and a special game play. The very first trip is to the distant city of Shanghai

name: Ski Rush
description: Ski down the mountain as long as possible avoiding obstacles. Collect flags to increase your score!

name: Interstellar Rangers
description:
A space shuttle named Interstellar Rangers is navigating in universe.
They are searching for a comfortable home for an affluent life.
However, a lot of obstacles are in front of them.
This game will give you the thrills and tension of navigating in space.

name: Pet Shelter Hero
description: Oh no! Four little pets are missing and their owners are really sad. Play the Pet Shelter Hero and hurry to the rescue! Drive Pet Shelter car and find the lost pets. Be a pet vet and treat pets, shower them and be their pet dentist when you clean their teeth. Return pets to their owners and make them happy again!

name: Flip2Green
description:
Flip2Green is a puzzle-logic game for people of all ages, and will provide you with hours of fun as you try to flip all the red tiles to green in as few moves possible.
