The fewer moves you make, the more stars you earn. But be careful... flip the wrong tile and you might set off a chain reaction that will undo all your good work!
Flip2Green is brilliant in its simplicity... Easy to learn, difficult to master.

name: Who Let The Chickens Out?
description: Welcome to "Who Let the Chickens Out?" a fun and challenging game that puts a unique spin on solving a feathery neighbor problem! Embark on a hilarious adventure where you'll use your skills and precision to deal with pesky chickens. It's time to turn those annoying cluckers into delicious chicken leg pieces!

name: Jumper's Quest
description:
Jump into a world full of unique obstacles that will test you both mentally and physically. Your quick thinking and reflexes will be put to the test as you decipher puzzles and navigate through each level with finesse.
Encounter a diverse array of enemies, each with their own unique challenges that you must conquer. Intuitive one-touch controls empower you to effortlessly jump through the levels in record time.

name: Wild Runners!
description: Wild Runners is a fun and innovative multiplayer 3D running game.

name: Dino 3D
description:
Get ready to embark on a thrilling prehistoric adventure like never before in DINO 3D!
This exciting video game takes the beloved classic offline game to a whole new dimension, bringing the endless runner experience into the immersive world of 3D.

name: Flip it
description: Flip it is the most challenging block puzzle out there. It’s not only important how you arrange the pieces, you also need to make sure that you’re arranging them in right order, because sometimes a piece can get blocked by the other piece.

name: Bonza Phrases
description:
This word puzzle game celebrates proverbs, idioms, and figures of speech that have become part of everyday language.
Join the pieces to complete the phrase, it's a piece of cake!
From the makers of Bonza Word Puzzle. "Bonza puzzles are instantly addictive!" - Will Shortz, Crossword Editor, The New York Times
Bonza Phrases is a casual word puzzle game for mobile. Players will appreciate the clear and simple approach, suitable for the whole family.

name: Swaplette
description:
Do you like word games and want to try something new?
In Swaplette your task is to compose pairs of English words in which some letters are interchanged. Tap on the letters to swap their positions with letters of the same colour in the other word until both words are complete.
You can set the difficulty of the game by the number of letters in the words, and also whether the first letters in the words are fixed or not.
Swaplette is not only fun to play, but it also helps you improve your vocabulary.
If you want, you can compare your score with other players on a global leaderboard.
Enjoy is game!

name: Whamble
description: Whamble is a multiplayer word search game where you compete with online players to find words in a letter grid. Whamble is a fun, compelling and educational word finding game!

name: Pickles
description: Pickles is an unreleased 3D adventure-platformer for the Nintendo GameCube featuring a monkey riding a unicycle.

name: Black Devilfish
description:
Are you looking for adventures? Become a pirate employed by the pirate brotherhood and a disaster for the Caribbean! Complete all the unique missions and help the pirates!
Command your submarine as you take out pirate ships and fortified islands with their cannons.

name: Zero no Tsukaima Fantasy Force 2nd Impact
description: Take to the skies a second time in the sequel to Familiar of Zero: Fantasy Force in a game inspired by 16 bit and arcade games.

name: Zero no Tsukaima Fantasy Force
description: Players control Louise as she flies through and shoots down a barrage of enemies in this 2D horizontal shooter inspired by games of the 8 bit era. Collect powerups, use screen clearing magic and try to make it to the end of each stage.

name: Buzz!: Quiz TV Special Edition
description: The Special Edition version of Buzz! also includes loads of game extras and features previously only available via PlayStation Network (PSN). These include four extra characters and ten cheeky new buzzer noises, as well as in-game trophies to reward top quizzers plus the new Quickstart mode, which cuts out set-up time and gets you straight into the game. Buzz!: Quiz TV Special Edition also offers PlayStation Eye compatibility, which means that the hilarious ‘Buzz! faces’ contestants pull at moments of tension and celebration can be broadcast in-game or shared with the world.

name: SingStar: Polskie Hity 2
description: SingStar: Polskie Hity 2 is a karaoke game exclusively released on the Polish market. There are no changes to the gameplay formula: player(s) sing into a microphone and the game gives points based on the performance. The only basis of assessment is if the correct note is hit with the correct timeing; the sung words or octave does not play into the result. The PS3 version allows access to the SingStore, an online shop for downloading additional songs.

name: SingStar Grandes Exitos
description: SingStar: Grandes Exitos is a karaoke exclusively released in Spain. It includes songs by Spanish artists without a limitation in genre or time period. There are no changes to the gameplay formula: player(s) sing into a microphone and the game gives points based on the performance. The only basis of assessment is if the correct note is hit with the correct timing; the sung words or octave does not play into the result.

name: SingStar Starter Pack
description: A Europe-exclusive version of SingStar that only contains 5 songs. The other 5 are downloadable using a code included with the game package.

name: SingStar Intro
description:
An Italy-exclusive version of Singstar Starter Pack that contains Italian songs.

Contains the following songs:
Elton John - Your Song
Franco Battiato - Bandiera Bianca
Lady Gaga - Poker Face
Max Gazzè - Una Musica Può Fare
Tiziano Ferro - Alla Mia Età

These songs are ready to be downloaded from SingStore:
Daniele Silvestri - Salirò
Lu Colombo - Maracaibo
Tiziano Ferro - E Fuori È Buio
Vasco Rossi - Vita Spericolata
Velvet - Boy Band

name: Sports Champions / Medieval Moves: Deadmund's Quest Combo Pack
description: A Mexico-exclusive double pack of Sports Champions and Medieval Moves: Deadmund's Quest

name: The Spy Who Loved Me 64
description:
The Spy Who Loved Me 64 is a full campaign mod for GoldenEye that aims to recreate the original film from 1977.

Currently available as a demo that features the first 3 levels of the game, and a glimpse of the multiplayer in level 4. Level 1 will take the player to the opening scene of the movie in the Alps. Level 2 will take place in a search for answers in Egypt, and Level 3 will pit the player up against a major assassin.

The project was made with a console first mentality, and has been thoroughly tested to run on N64 hardware. An Expansion Pak is required, however.

name: Command & Conquer: Generals Evolution
description: A Red Alert 3 total conversion aiming to bring C&C Generals Zero Hour onto the new engine as well as to expand upon it.

name: Pokémon Snap: Rith Essa
description: A custom level for Pokémon Snap

name: Pokémon Snap: Basement
description: A custom level for Pokémon Snap.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Zelda's Eternal Youth
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Sacred Armor - Project Izou
description: Sin descripción

name: Timespinner 2: Unwoven Dream
description: Travel to the Tower in the Sea to avert the apocalypse, in this exploration action-platformer. Join Auria, a retired war hero, as she adventures through a beautiful and dangerous world to save her family and the fabric of reality itself!

name: Continuum
description: Continuum - become a combat MECH pilot in a brutal environment of the galactic post-apocalypse. In order to survive you'd have to collect resources, search for lost technologies and improve your combat vehicle. Defeat powerful adversaries, survive and become stronger.

name: Isolation
description: Sin descripción

name: Probationary Girlfriend
description: Sin descripción

name: 1-ppun Miru dake! Meiga de Kioku-ryoku Test Art de Nou-tra!
description: Sin descripción

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Maru-Batsu Joshiki-ryoku Kantei
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Paradise: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sugar Daddy Support
description: Sin descripción

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Initial 2: New Stage & Xuan Yuan Sword Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Bionic Breakthrough
description: Bionic Breakthrough was one of only two games written to be used with the MindLink controller, a headband that the player wore on his head and plugged into the joystick port. The idea was that the MindLink's sensors would pick up any facial movements or muscle twitches the player would make. The problem was that the MindLink didn't work very well in initial test runs, and even when it did worked players would complain of headaches and dizziness from twitching their face. Bionic Breakthrough is really just Super Breakout with a title screen. It's unknown if this was just supposed to be a demo to show what the MindLink could do, or if it was actually a standalone product. Before the game starts there is a screen where the word MindLink slowly scrolls to the bottom, this is for callibration. On this screen the player can move the text block left and right to make sure the Mindlink is working properly. Bionic Breakthrough was never released.

name: Atom Smasher
description: A battle to the last atom! The Atomic Arena is where all sorts of nasty, burly life-forms come to contest each other in the galaxy's deadliest game! Armed with a regulation Atom Smasher Blaster, you must blast unstable atomic particles past your opponent and out of the arena, but if one hits you, it degrades your very atomic structure, and the results aren't pretty. But remember, someone else has the same goal...

name: AndroMan on the Moon
description: Androman was a small white robot that would scurry about on a floor mat while the player controlled him using the Atari 2600. Androman also had a barcode scanner in his bottom that would read barcodes placed on the map so the 2600 (and the robot) knew where he was. Using a combination of the joystick and barcodes, the player could guide Androman around the floor mat and play various games. One of those games being Androman on the Moon.

name: 3-D Zapper
description: Unreleased game programmed by Todd Marshall. Within existing internal documents the given title is "3-D Zapper," though the prototype cartridge itself has an end label that reads merely "3-D Demo," while the PCB within features a sticker reading "3D Space" and a date of December 13, 1982. Internal documents describe the game briefly as follows: "This game contains the elements of a typical shoot-em-up spree game. The unique elements of this game are: (1) that the invaders perform erratic randomized dances in a three-dimensional field. (2) The 3-D operation of the gun. (3) The invaders themselves are particularly tailored to provide an exciting 3-D effect on the ATARI VCS."

name: 3D Genesis
description: Peace through superior firepower! In the far future, the planet is overrun with enormous, super insects, who fiercely battle each other for survival. You've chosen a side to fight for, and the enemy has been funneled into a deep crevice, but now you're outnumbered. You put their numbers to the test. They say the meek shall inherit the Earth, but how long can you defend it? This was originally planned to be 1 of 3 "3-D" games on Power-Play Arcade cart #1. A screenshot was shown in a catalog for Amiga's Power System, but no description was included. It was programmed by Dan McElroy and Jerry Lawson in 1983, shelved, and made available for limited release in 2010.

name: WorldCup Super Stadium
description: Sin descripción

name: Mahou City
description: 3D Action Battle City like game.

name: Defense of Nations
description: A base defense shooter in the vein of flash game classics like "Elona Shooter" and "Defend Your Castle" but with a satirical, political-sim twist. Shoot hordes of monsters, negotiate your operating budget, and navigate international rivalries, all for The Good of Humanity️!

name: Naoko to Hide-bou: Sansuu no Tensai 2 - Hayasa no Bunshoudai Tsuukasan Part I
description: Sin descripción

name: Naoko to Hide-bou: Sansuu no Tensai 1: Wa to Sa no Bunshoudai Tsurukamezan Part I
description: Sin descripción

name: Footie
description: An unlicensed football game for the 3DO.

name: X-Men: Mind Games
description:
The unreleased X-Men game for the 32X, known in later stages as X-Men: Mind Games. Although this is quite an elusive game concerning unreleased titles for the 32X, it has a lot to offer.

Development of this game was assigned to Scavenger, who owned some studios (like Zyrinx and Lemon) featuring many former Amiga demoscene developers, known for their high-tech profile and their enthusiasm into pushing systems to their limits.

This X-Men adventure with beat 'em up-esque gameplay is a 3D game with stunning visuals for its time, probably redefining a new age of titles for the Mega Drive add-on.

The prototype is quite early, something of a tech-demo which allows selecting and playing a couple levels from a concept title screen. The levels feature several playable areas -some of them having no enemies at all- and a single playable character, Bishop.

With this proto we have a great playable sketch of a game that could have probably surpassed our expectations, having been finished and released, that is. This is a great showcase for both the 32X and the Scavenger studios.

X-Men: Mind Games was never released.

name: Hitstream
description:
Work up a sweat without even realising it as you punch, stretch, squat & step your way to fitness in this 360° game where challenges greet you from every angle.

Designed with positive energy & mental wellbeing in mind, Hitstream takes you to stunning locations across the globe, bringing the outdoor world to you, wherever you are.

Hit the targets, catch the orbs, dodge the walls, & meet the head rings.

This full-body workout comes with over 12 hours of choreographed gameplay across 3 difficulty levels plus random journey options, multiplayer, & both virtual & mixed reality environments, meaning Hitstream can be as different or familiar as you like each time you play.

Every action is perfectly timed to the beat of the music, with soundtracks that have been specially selected to take you on a range of journeys, from uplifting adventures that work on agility to hard-hitting routines that build strength & stamina.

Additional challenges await those who achieve a score of 90% or more -- can you make the grade?

Hitstream: the challenge surrounds you!

name: The Swan Princess: Hidden Tales
description:
Your favorite princess is back with a new hidden objects game!
Help Odette, Derek, Alise, Uberta and Bromley in this new and exciting adventure! Win stars and find incredible secrets on this game!
Play your own story! Even if you don't beat a task, a brand new storyline can be opened only for you!

name: Taco Joe: Endless Taco Tosser
description: Joe is a simple man who loves nothing more than serving up delicious tacos and tossing them at an endless crowd of hungry customers!

name: Fall Ninja
description: Tap the screen left and right to rotate the board and navigate your Ninja through the puzzle landing on the other Ninja's and destroying them!

name: Magnate: Robot Idle Tycoon
description: Start at the bottom selling old machine parts and junk droids and... tap, tap, tap your way to your very own cyberpunk empire! Before you know it you’ll be able to hire managers to do the hard graft for you, and with billions banked, you must face the ultimate fat cat dilemma; take the path of GOOD or EVIL in your pursuit of even greater fortune?

name: HardBall
description:
Can you get the ball in the basket? It's NOT EASY, it's HARDBALL!
HardBall is a challenging puzzle game with simple swipe gameplay, suitable for all ages.

name: Dr. Mary
description:
Viruses Fighter is a classic minigame, in which you are playing as a doctor to kill the bacteria with different capsules.
Match four or more colors either horizontally or vertically to delete them. Each level is completed when all of the bacterias have been defeated.

name: Mo Jie Qibing
description: Lord of the Rings bootleg Taiwanese game.

name: La Voz Vol. 3
description: Sin descripción

name: U-Sing 2: Australian Edition
description: A version of U-Sing 2 that features Australian music.

name: Buddhagillie
description: Shooting game playing as Buddha

name: Monster Hearts R
description: Strange shooting game for PC.

name: Advanced Spanner-X: Endless Fire
description: Space shooter for Sharp.

name: Spellbound Party
description: Spellbound Party offers a fun learning experience for the whole family. Take on friends and family in the ultimate spelling showdown in a crazy game show environment. Your host will take you on a rollercoaster ride of fun as you go head to head with up to 3 players in 'Party' mode. To give learning a competitive edge players are rewarded more points for choosing difficult words to spell. Children can also take on adults in Spellbound Generations mode where the spelling level is determined by the players' age. Features: * Choose from 8 avatars as well as slots for guest players * 4 Single Player modes: Championships, Training, Mini-Games, List of Shame * Up to 4 players can battle it out in the multiplayer Party Mode * Spellbound Generations mode offers a handicapping system allowing kids to compete against adults

name: Helion
description: Are you ready to embark on an intergalactic journey like never before? Step into the thrilling world of "Helion," where tactical teamwork, role-based strategy, and stunning stylized graphics collide in an epic sci-fi adventure. Get ready to experience the future of team-based third-person shooters!

name: Concubine
description: A sensual, hack dark fantasy ARPG. Fully customize an adorable concubine and up to three female companions with deep cosmetix details. Be the private assassin of the Sultan and earn sexy outfits, powerful weapons & mystic skills. Design & customize your harem base at the Grand Palace.

name: Cemetery Defence
description: Cemetery Defense is a tower defense game. Your task is to prevent the destruction of the barrier wall by installing towers and improving them for greater combat effectiveness. The number of enemy forces will only grow, but the tactical advantage will be upgrades to your towers and walls.

name: Chalice of Souls: Grahan
description: Embark on a thrilling journey with Baani, a college student with a tribal background attempting to uncover the secrets of her ancestors. When her friend Sarah is kidnapped by a murderous cult obsessed with immortality,she must confront her own sanity & fight to rescue her friend before it's too late

name: Fast Equality
description: Fast Equality - A game with a choice of actions in a mathematical environment. You are given a set of certain mathematical symbols, each of which can turn the entire course of the game, both simplifying and getting the desired number, and away from it by a huge number of steps!

name: Firebowl
description: FireBowl is an Arcade Multiplayer game inspired by the classics. It is set in High Fantasy world with all the classic characters such as Halflings, Wizards or... Toilets? Join the party and discover the number one sport of the Middle Ages.

name: DroneZ XL
description: DroneZ XL transports you to a hostile future that, because of neglect and pollution, has forced people to live immersed in feedback units. These units, which are connected to the V-Space network, are dominated by Artificial Intelligences who forbid people to disconnect.

name: Drunkoff V.
description: "Drunkoff V." is a narrative game with elements of horror, telling the dramatic story of the main character. You will have to come face to face with skeletons in the closet along with him. The events unfold in the post-Soviet era.

name: Hinge
description: Hinge is a psychological horror game inspired by Lovecraft and Bioshock. Explore atmospheric locations, search for clues, survive the nightmare, and discover who you are and why you're here.

name: Hal_4
description: >HAL_4 is a singleplayer action-puzzle horror game. Navigate a series of anomalous environments as you solve puzzles and escape death-traps by taking them apart.

name: Grug to Future
description: Jurassic Park meets Roguelite Tower Defense: As a caveman, venture into a primal world and collect futuristic relics. Build your deck with unique cards granting powerful perks & abilities! Face dino invasions, shape your strategy, and embrace the age clash.

name: Fragment
description: A role playing game about growing plants to heal the environment in real time. Gather your crew, upgrade your ship, and build a better future for the inhabitants of the eight rings.

name: Freeway Nightmare
description: Freeway Nightmare - A 2D game with an overhead view, the protagonist runs forward in his dream, wielding various guns, which can be improved over time by collecting materials from killed enemies. More enemies and obstacles appear as you progress!

name: Glam Pursuit
description: Enter the dazzling world of Glam Pursuit in Sunshine City. Master the unique acting system, shape your actor, and navigate the highs and lows of fame. Watch your scenes steal the limelight on the silver screen. Your path to stardom begins here!

name: Operation Terra
description: Lead mankind to its new Earth in this science fiction First Person Shooter/Role Playing Game. Grab your gear and fight through hordes of hideous robots, droids and machines. Loot credits and power ups. Complete missions to unlock permanent bonuses. With procedurally generated levels and maps.

name: Philistine
description: Join Priam as he navigates a world that wants him dead. Help him make decisions as he’s met with trials and tribulations that never cease to antagonize him. While he has his own character, you may be surprised with how heroic, or villainous, he may be based upon the decisions you’ve made.

name: Pinhole Universe
description: A game of exploration, curiosity, and fascination. Single-player, low-pressure and endless variety.

name: Pharmageddon
description: Journey into an otherworldly dimension, guiding opioid zombies on their quest for transcendent release in this unique strategy game.

name: Lens Of Horror
description: Descend into the psyche of an elder known for his red hat. Is his world an illusion or a horrifying reality? Each shadow holds untold secrets, with a line blurring reality and delusion. Seek the truth, but it unveils itself only at the end. Are you brave enough to look through the Lens of Horror?

name: Legends of Savvarah: Flowers and Scorpions
description: You are Nikaria. An agent of a mysterious god, sent to another country. Does the end justify the means? Is the will of the god above the law? Is the death of a non-believer insignificant? The decision is yours alone.

name: Legend of the Landscaper
description: A survival roguelite set in a sprawling maze of hedges and topiary. Channel your inner swordsman to mow down fields of overgrown grass and anyone unfortunate enough to get in your way.

name: Legends
description: "Legends" is an adventure puzzle game that parodies Chinese mythology. You will play as the protagonist "Hong-Niang," who goes to the town to buy ingredients for her parents and stop the bad guys from disrupting the ceremony.

name: Kanji Combi: Yakuzumo
description: Practice and test your kanji knowledge! Drag and drop components to form the right kanji in the right place. While you learn, you help an overweight buffoon cheat his way through his first official sumo match! Some knowledge of Japanese language is required to play.

name: Rogue Mech
description: Pilot your trusty Phoenix in this isometric, post-apocalyptic mecha survival game with base building elements. Trade, plant, hack, dig, talk and fight your way through the wastelands. If you survive, you might be able to restore a little green to this ash-ridden world.

name: Project Wunderwaffe: War in Ukraine
description: Become a part of the alliance that supports the Ukrainian Army. Manage new-age weapon production and the largest modern military logistical hub. Build a strong coalition that will help Ukraine win in the shortest possible time.

name: Shitting Pigeon
description: Shitting Pigeon is a 3D pigeon stealth action game and bird droppings simulator. Fly over the city, scare people and eat a lot of bread.

name: Sex Room 3
description: Welcome to the world of virtual excitement and sexual power in the clicker generator of adulterous entertainment SEX Room 3 [18+]! Feel the depth of your power over sinful desires and start your journey to riches and fame

name: SCP: Centura Tycoon
description: Rebuild the SCP Foundation, contain anomalies, and face the Chaos Insurgency. Your choices shape humanity's fate. Can you secure, contain, and protect?

name: Space Station Multiverse
description: Become a crew member on a multiplayer space station and try to survive as long as possible.

name: Station Unknown
description: As a new employee of the Station Unknown - you'll have to adapt to the new challenges of the night shift. You're on your own, manage to fulfill your shift tasks and the same time face the darkness surrounding the station. Survival-horror meets management simulator.

name: The Cosmic Tramp
description: Embark on a cosmic journey as Moby, a curious wanderer. Traverse surreal realms, meet eccentric characters, and uncover the universe's enigmatic wonders. Each encounter offers unique stories and perspectives, expanding your understanding of existence.

name: The Bullet Hopper
description: A rabbit find itself dead, help it gains its life back in this time limited platformer where knowledge and skills are required. To aid you in this quest, an arsenal of guns is at your disposal, employing their bullets to propel you forward and upward.

name: Terror Spikys
description: Get hired as a Cactus Hunter, explore the killer cacti infested open-world with your truck, help villagers in return for valuables and wipe out the so-called Terror Spikys.

name: Stolen Mushrooms
description: Stolen Mushrooms - a 2D platformer where you as a frog take revenge on the brazen mutants who stole your winter supplies, jumping through different levels and destroy enemies. Purchase everything you need in the in-game store and complete all levels. There should be only one left!

name: Tribe of the Accord
description: Tribe of the Accord is a pixel-art action RPG where players take on the role of Adira. Survive, hunt, and uncover secrets in a hostile world while building a bond with Adira's father, Torion.

name: Trakonius
description: A gladiator fighting for his freedom in the sands of the arena... Unaware of the prophecy, Trakonius has fallen into the arena through the machinations of the senate. Even the gods will help him in his tough battle for freedom in the name of justice, but still can he win his freedom?

name: Unlimited
description: Forget the track, skip the turns, and discover what 'speed' really means with Unlimited.

name: The Tower of Tears
description: The Tower Of Tears is a survival-horror game set in a mysterious labyrinthine architecture. Explore this strange and vast place to carve your way out or find the source of the tears. You are not alone and danger is lurking. Use wisely every tools available to stay alive...

name: Street Football 2
description: Leave the rules of football behind you. Play on improvised fields in the middle of the city and use the environment to your advantage. Walls and objects can be used to play your opponent. Everything is possible in street football without a coach! Take part in exciting competitions and exciting games and become the first world champion in street football!

name: We Sing Deutsche Hits 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The World of Golden Eggs: Nori Nori Rhythm-kei - Nissan Note Original Version
description: A version of The World of Golden Eggs: Nori Nori Rhythm-kei made to advertise the Nissan Note vehicle.

name: Hasbro Family Game Night Value Pack
description: A bundle containing Hasbro Family Game Night 1 and 2.

name: Unoxi
description: Explore a disparate ruin gripped between the jaws of the universe. Reawaken forgotten knowledge in this twist on a classic sokoban puzzler.

name: Vorum
description: Vorum is a retro-inspired RPG with elements of noir, horror, investigation, and science fiction. Its narrative is somewhat inspired by recent events in humanity, with touches of philosophy. It's a post-apocalyptic world with problems similar to our own.

name: WoofChat
description: Unleash your creativity in a customizable online nightclub. Be anyone, chat with other captivating players. Play on PC, iOS, Android—anywhere, anytime!

name: Hasbro Family Game Night: Fun Pack
description: A bundle featuring Family Game Night 2 and 3.

name: Arouse
description: Ignite your passion and explore a world of lust and desire. Create a character from your wildest dreams and fulfill your deepest fantasies with a realistic sex simulator. It's time to get aroused!

name: Angry Choice
description: Angry Choice is 2D game with a side view, where you control a girl with a gun, fighting with monsters, which are also armed and dangerous, but no less dangerous and the world itself, which conceals traps of varying degrees of danger, challenge this mysterious world!

name: Aboleo: Shadow of the Crown
description: Immerse yourself in 'Shadow of the Crown,' an RPG where the line between heroism and darkness blurs. Step into the enigmatic role of a charismatic figure, torn between conquering or saving a kingdom. Shape its destiny through trust or chaos. Your choices wield the power to define its fate.

name: Der Gesundheitscoach
description: Der Gesundheitscoach is a health and fitness game released in Europe for the Nintendo Wii.

name: The Dead Zone
description: The soldiers who survived the disaster. In a world that has turned into apocalypse, explore those challenging death zones, and in order to defend the continuation of human civilization, kill all those ugly monsters! Lead the survivors to survive in this disaster.

name: Walls
description: Slava is an ordinary guy living in a shabby socket. Well, like living, existing. He has lost all his dreams, and now he has one task - not to live until dawn. But before that you need to write a will...

name: Manakoto Hitomi no Bawai
description: Sin descripción

name: Die drei???: Das verfluchte Schloss
description: A new case leads Jupiter, Peter and Bob to an abandoned castle where a ghost is up to mischief. But the three detectives soon discover that there is much more to this spooky story than initially assumed - The new Wii game will be released in spring 2009 to coincide with the start of the new feature film by the cult detectives, "The Three ??? - The Cursed Castle". can replay Wii. The exciting location Schloss offers numerous partially hidden rooms to explore and many tricky puzzles and exciting tasks to solve. Quick reactions, knowledge and logical thinking are required to solve the mystery.

name: Crazy Quiz! Are You Crazy Enough?
description: The combination of quiz show and party games on Wii. Combine up to four players in a colorful 3D TV studio. There are eight animated and customizable player characters to choose from. Accompanied by the moderator Max, Answer many quiz questions and complete exciting mini-games in an impressive environment. More than 1,800 questions in nine different subject areas. Features: Real studio environment in a 3D TV studio with presenter Max. Unique player characters, each with four different outfits that can be activated in the course of the game. Different multiplayer and single player game modes. Wide range of entertainment with quizzes and mini games for the whole family.

name: 500 Caliber Contractz
description: 500 Caliber Contractz is a momentum-based 3D-Platformer in which you play as a contract killer hired via crowdfunding to murder CEOs, Disgraced Sinister Ex-Doctors, Private-Prison-Owning DJs, etc. With your handy high caliber sniper rifle and a chest full of anxiety, you can and will propel yourself to where you need to be. Collect tokens that float around for a reason I haven't bothered coming up with and then murder your target. Do it. Please.

name: Sonar
description: Sonar is a cancelled game for the Atari 2600. A prototype of the game was dumped on AtariProtos.com in March 2023.

name: Otaku Puzzle!
description: A 3D top-down puzzle game with any image, GIF, video allowed, plus multiplayer.

name: The Invasion 2
description:
The Invasion 2 is a Super Mario Brothers X Episode that was created by Redigit.

Unlike the original Invasion, it has only 7 bonus levels as opposed to 12 and adds the "Star Palace", an area with many bonus items for the player to collect if they have enough Stars. It also introduces names for worlds and map warps.

name: Wordler
description: Wordler is a word puzzle game that is playable on the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment package. The game is a clone of the browser game Wordle.

name: Grab the Sushi
description: Grab the Sushi is a puzzle game that is playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Starship Defender
description: Starship Defender is a browser-based space shooter game for mobile devices that is playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Snake Challenge
description: Snake Challenge is a mobile browser game that is playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment package.

name: Koala Sling
description: Koala Sling is an arcade mobile-browser game that is playable on the Singpore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Office Hurdles
description: Office Hurdles is a browser-based mobile game playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Fruit Blade
description: Fruit Blade is an action game that is included in the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Drift Boss
description: Drift Boss is a game included in the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Airport Run
description: Airport Run is a browser game included in the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Donkey Gorilla
description: Simple graphics PC88 game.

name: Karakuri Ninpou
description: Arcade ninja game.

name: Skyscraper
description: Single-screen shooter for PC88.

name: Super Mario In Element World 2: The Master Hand Revenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario In Element World
description: Sin descripción

name: SMWLV
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Nostalgia World
description: Sin descripción

name: Digital Eclipse Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario World: The Huge Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: The 2018 Fantastic Arcade Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Ping
description: The classic game of video ping-pong now on Playdate!

name: Crank & Watch: Octopus
description: Retrieve the treasures from the chest guarded by the octopus.

name: Metal Detector and 2nd Hundred
description: Playdate puzzlers!

name: Evhacon
description:
Assume the role of an unknown hero charged with aiding the Aecherians on a epic quest steeped in mystery and high adventure!
In typical RPG fashion you’ll go on quests, fight monsters and level up your character.
Enhance your attributes and talents as you see fit to achieve the playing style that most fits your playing style.

name: Idol Shooter
description:
Idol Shooter is an archery game that shoots swords towards fixed or moving targets.
Gameplay can be done by tapping the screen and then releasing it.
Idol Shooter provides a variety of backgrounds and targets with endless gameplay.

name: I Am Level
description:
Flick, bounce, and roll your character through the bizarre yet stylish world of ‘I Am Level’ in this original mix of pinball and platform game.
Tilt your device to get the ball rolling, then tap or hold anywhere on the screen to fire off pinball bumpers, springs, and doors. Clear the screens to unlock more of the map, and level up your player to unlock new costumes.

name: Poppy Birds
description: A mobile puzzle game.

name: Super Kart Racer
description: Super Kart Racer is an old-school isometric karting game. Enjoy high-speed racing along with many other game modes to keep things fresh.

name: The Legend of Robin Hood
description: This game was in the final stages before release. At this vital time Kevin Costner's movie, Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves was released. But Arcadia didn't have the funds to obtain licensing from both Nintendo and the movie, so they were forced to pull out. The game itself is an action RPG and it shows the life of all the Merry-Men.

name: The Dark House
description:
Spooky lights, strange noises have been heard by walkers passing by an old unused house. What is causing this usual activity?
Tom is determined to find out, along with a slightly reluctant Jen!
Join Tom and Jen as they go on an exciting adventure right on their doorstep.
What will happen on the adventure? You decide!

name: Arcadia VI
description: Arcadia VI is an unfinished multi-cart that was intended to be released on the NES with 6 games. The only known proto has 4 games. Of the 4 games, only one game (Tennis) has been completed. The 4 games on the cart are: Tennis, Xerxes, Ghurka, and Twin Cam Turbo

name: Project Maverick
description:
People Can Fly, the team behind games such as Gears of War: Judgement and Outriders, shared on Wednesday that the company has entered an agreement with Microsoft to develop a new video game based on a work-for-hire contract. The game, codenamed Project Maverick, is based on the "intellectual property rights owned by the publisher" and will be developed with a budget of $30-50 million.

Little else is known at this time. People Can Fly has expanded significantly in the last couple of years, growing with multiple studios around the world with seven games currently in development across over 600 staff.

name: Armchair Commander
description: A turn-based strategy game where you can experience historical campaigns or explore your own historical scenarios and those created by others in the mapping community.

name: Build Master: MarsVille
description: Build Master: MarsVille is a city-building and strategy game that invites you to create your Martian colony with your engineering genius and building skills. Form alliances, trade resources, and conquer rival colonies. Embrace the challenge and become the ultimate Build Master on Mars!

name: Bombastic Land
description: Blast your way through dungeons in a Rogue-Lite Retro style, fighting slimes and bosses! Expand your home, populate the land, take care of your garden, go fishing with bombs and race your Kart until the wheels fall off!

name: Carachnophobia
description: Step into a galaxy not far far away, where an alien race plotting the end of mankind discovered a spectacular creature that has the potential to create the necessary chaos. There is only one problem; it is not very intelligent and requires some training!

name: Boxman
description: A friend in need and the fate of multiple worlds sitting on one small cardboard box’s tiny shoulders, luckily this box came with a hero inside and a lot of packing peanuts! Join BOX as they jump, grab and swing across multiple chapters all in the name of friendship!

name: Born In Reverie
description: Experience Dani and the Guardians' story as they defend their home from the Beasts. Delve deep into the mountains to fight the beastly scourge, explore Dani's peculiar dreams, and discover the reason to keep moving forward.

name: At the Edge of the World
description: A lone fisherman sits at the edge of the world. Something stirs inside of him. It wants to be fed.

name: Goodbye Seoul: Itaewon
description: In the face of global destruction. Rayon pursues government's secret project for space evacuation. "Goodbye Seoul : Itaewon" is a puzzle adventure game that neutralize enemies and overcomes the environment in a city with various dangers.

name: Gorfest
description: Discover an intense post-apocalyptic survival FPS, with a thrilling story. Scavenge the island for food, ammo, weapons and fuel while fighting off hordes of zombies in a massive open world. Keep your hunger and thirst in check, and be prepared to repair vehicles when needed. It's time to survive!

name: Heroes of the Ashenwatch
description: Heroes of the Ashenwatch is a challenging CO-OP Action RPG where up to 5 players team up to defeat the hordes of evil.

name: House of Legacy
description: Early autumn, as rebel forces breached the city walls, you found yourself at the helm of your surviving kin, embarking on an arduous journey. Seeking refuge in the last bastion of unyielding hope, a county seat untarnished by the chaos, you ignited the flames of a nascent dynasty.

name: Kardashev
description: Kardashev is a first-person, space set, open world, factory building game.

name: Fall Valley
description: Step into the breathtaking world of Fall Valley, where the vibrant hues of autumn await your discovery. Immerse yourself in a serene, orange-colored wonderland as you embark on a soul-soothing journey through this stunning valley.

name: Nightlife Tycoon
description: Nightlife Tycoon is a bar management game, where you have to build your dream bar and make it thrive. Hire staff, take care of customers, organize incredible events and become the king of nightlife!

name: Letifer
description: Take on the demonic threat as Letifer and gun your way through different Rituals. Choose from a diverse pool of upgrades to create your ultimate build and then own it! Bring the fruits of your labour back to your base and make lasting upgrades to your character and gear.

name: Past Memos
description: "The game Past Memos is a game set in three different time periods, containing puzzles and mysteries. It aims to blend its features with a narrative to provide players with a beautiful experience. You must unravel the mystery in different time periods to shed light on the future."

name: Pure Badminton
description: Pure Badminton is the most realistic Badminton simulation game.Experience the sensations of badminton, in a fast, technical and strategical game.

name: Story Time
description: Turn based Strategy game focused on multiplayer. Choose 9 characters, battle your friends, build levels, share them.the player with the most characters after 20 turns wins.

name: Shard Seekers
description: Shard Seekers is a 3rd person shooter rogue-like dungeon-crawler where players command elemental golems through a mechanical, crystal-laden dungeon that changes with each run.

name: Survival Dead Poly
description: Survival Dead Poly is contains almost everything you need to survival and have an adventure games.Good luck on your journey!

name: The Big Lez Video Game
description: Choose between battle royale, deathmatch, infected and free roam mode and play with your friends as some of the main Big Lez Show characters! Use each characters specific special ability to assist you during combat and create your preferred weapon loadout to play optimally. Beware of the Choomahs!

name: The Last Martian
description: The only survivor. The Last Martian. Unite 10 civilizations against an invincible enemy. Fight for the right to life of the last people in the universe, during 20 hours of storyline. Author's Uroboros Universum. A game unlike any other.

name: The Spirits of Whispermoon
description: Embark on an unforgettable co-op adventure in The Spirits of Whispermoon. Team up with friends to jump into a world of magic and mystery, full of intricate puzzles, treacherous dungeons, and fearsome foes.

name: Escape Him.
description: You're not alone, in this labyrinth of hallways. However, whatever that thing is, it's not human.

name: Escapen't
description: YOU CANNOT ESCAPE - I made sure of that. Solve puzzles, gather clues, don’t crawl into ventilation shafts, and realize how trapped you are in this comedy-horror escape room, my magnum opus.

name: Eviction
description: Eviction is a horror puzzle game where you must uncover the story of a family that was devastated by a mutant virus. Play through 6 unique levels and unlock new endings combinations to find new content! Once you are finished you can check out the multiplayer version where you team up to battle foes!

name: Dark Zone
description: Immerse in an infected world. As a soldier, seek the truth of a zombie epidemic. Explore dark landscapes, uncover secrets, and fight for survival. Unravel the origin before it's too late. Ready to face the truth?

name: Sentinel: Stones of Disruption
description: Sentinel: Stones of Disruption is a pulse-pounding sci-fi roguelike shoot'em up on a remote planet. Step into the metal shoes of a powerful robot on a mission to reclaim a stolen crystal from alien adversaries. Restoring this gem is crucial to bringing harmony back to a shattered world.

name: Twilight Array
description: A narrative-driven sci-fi exploration game that sees a couple being torn apart by invisible forces whilst trying to salvage an abandoned spaceship and uncover its mysteries.

name: Wizardry Level C
description: The discovery of an old magic book turns your life upside down. Will you succeed in becoming a guild wizard—or will you travel a different path?

name: Wizard Cats Tank Battle
description: Choose from seven classes and fight other Wizard Cats in Wizard Cats Tank Battle, a cross-platform multiplayer game inspired by both classic arena shooters and MMORPGs!

name: Samsara Agent
description: "Samsara Agent"is a dark apocalyptic action Roguelite game. You will play the role of a survivor of the apocalypse, carrying a unique skill and inheriting the power of the Starry Kings, just like opening a system to enter the apocalypse, bringing a glimmer of peace to this apocalypse!

name: Fortnite: The High Stakes Club Pack
description: One could certainly say that the Club does "slay" in their formal attire. Serve looks with The High Stakes Club pack. Includes 3 Outfits, 3 Back Blings, 3 Pickaxes and 3 Wraps.

name: Gas Station Simulator: Fly me to the moon bundle
description:
Embark on a sky-high adventure with veteran Joe in the "Fly me to the Moon" bundle.

Bundle includes:

- Gas Station Simulator
- Gas Station Simulator - Airstrip DLC

name: Phosphor
description: Phosphor is a first-person shooter that uses Adobe Shockwave Player to run within your web browser.

name: Databugs
description: Net Yaroze game.

name: Come Baa
description: Net Yaroze game.

name: Dot Kuzushi
description: Net Yaroze game.

name: Elevation II
description: PD Amiga game.

name: Brewing Haus
description: Brew your legacy and explore an inviting world as you create and expand your business. Embark on a serene beer brewing journey in this relaxing simulation game. Discover new recipes, expand, and master the art of brewing.

name: Astarian Adventures
description: Embark on a cosmic visual novel adventure on a male-absent planet. Navigate choices that shape your destiny, form bonds with alien females, and determine the future of the Astarian race. Will you be their savior or downfall? Dive into "Astarian Adventures" and forge your path.

name: Anticitizen: Red
description: Use bullet time, a variety of movement mechanics and an improvised arsenal to outwit and outgun biker gangs and corporate police in an American-occupied cyberpunk Australia. Meet a unique cast of Aussie battlers, delve into the lore of the new American empire, and stay for the larrikin charm.

name: Archer Hero
description: Take aim, and let your arrow fly in this randomly generated, top-down rogue-like. Choose your path wisely, as you traverse the mysterious isles that lay before you... Plenty of loot and hardships await.

name: Cryptfall
description: In this 1-4 Player Co-Op game, gather resources, fight fierce enemies, and craft essential tools in a dynamic island adventure. Race against time to survive as an ancient evil awakens in just 10 days!"

name: Crypt Survivor
description: Descend into alien crypts, collect vital crystals, and battle hostile extraterrestrial creatures in this gripping sci-fi survival shooter. Your mission: save your species and unearth the secrets hidden in the depths.

name: Crafty County
description: A captivating city-building puzzle game, blending strategy with creativity as you help towns by merging groups of four buildings into unique structures to make them grow and prosper.

name: Coreless
description: Coreless is a roguelike action game blending deep RPG customization elements, set in a sci-fi world. Craft your unique playstyle through a rich system of avatars, protocols, augmenters, and traits, as you tackle challenging bosses in this action-packed adventure.

name: Chain Drop
description: A fast-paced puzzle game for match lovers

name: Hell God
description: The developers describe its content like this: Hell God contains violence, blood and gore. It can produce scares in some circumstances.

name: Guardian Untold
description: Guardian Untold is a top-down, defense adventure with 1-2 player co-op. Gather resources, restore your village, and stand against the creatures lurking within the Unknown.

name: Fuel's & Friends
description: Fuel's & Friends is a first person horror shoppkeeper simulator game. Investigate an dead relative old computer to find it's secrets. Upgrade and explore the shop to expand your business !

name: Divemensions
description: Divemensions is a 2D Puzzle Platformer.... just that the levels are not actually 2D! In this game you'll need to move between the layers of the world to overcome various challenges! Get ready to solve puzzles by understanding the 3D layout of the levels or create your own with the level editor!

name: Drinkrime
description: Jin, a talking liquor bottle with supernatural powers, has given you a mission. Face DRINKRIME's cast of unique characters and force them to confess their crimes. Interrogate them together and make those wrongdoers come to terms with their guilt!

name: Dropkick Navvy
description: Dropkick Navvy is a physics-based crafting/survival sim. Scurry, gather, and build, to help your pal the World Tree reassemble a broken cosmos. Which broke all on its own, totally at random, and no one in particular was responsible.

name: Elementary Trolleyology
description: Elementary Trolleyology is a game about your first (and only) day working at SciPhi, the world's leader in ethical alignment. You will work on a secretive project developing a "morality module" for an advanced AI. Every decision you will make means the difference between life and death for others.

name: Leap Hero
description: The princess has been captured! Step into the armored boots of a frog and use your tongue as a grappling hook to beat challenging levels. Encounter quirky characters and dive into this thrilling rescue mission.

name: Lum's Game
description: Live an idyllic life growing a garden with your family, and taking care of their strange pet! Life is perfect, except for these strange dreams you keep having...

name: RiBeat!
description: RiBeat! is a challenging rhythm game. Hop with the beat of the music while avoiding obstacles and solving puzzles. Play as Muira, the frog deity, and dive into the world of rhythm, puzzles, and catchy music!

name: Dungeon Croaker
description: Dungeon Croaker is a frog themed turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler. Navigate randomly generated dungeon floors, find and synergize relic effects, fight enemies with unique abilities, avoid dangerous environmental hazards, and defeat powerful dungeon bosses.
